translation.en: Good morning, Daddy.
translation.zh: 早上好 老爸

translation.en: Hey, Ben, how you doing, man?
translation.zh: 嘿 本 你好吗？

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 上帝

translation.en: Daddy's got to get ready for work.
translation.zh: 老爸要准备上班了

translation.en: Can't you stay home?
translation.zh: 你不能待在家里吗？

translation.en: No. I got a real big day at work today.
translation.zh: 不行 今天我有很多工作要做 很多事情

translation.en: Kim.
translation.zh: 金

translation.en: Where's my cell phone?
translation.zh: 我的手机呢？

translation.en: It's with my crayons.
translation.zh: 和蜡笔在一起

translation.en: It's not supposed to be with the crayons.
translation.zh: 手机不该和蜡笔放在一起

translation.en: There you go, sweetie.
translation.zh: 给你 宝贝

translation.en: Okay, has anybody seen my beeper?
translation.zh: 谁见到我的传呼机了？

translation.en: Here it is.
translation.zh: 在这儿

translation.en: Right by the grape juice. I wonder how it got there.
translation.zh:
在葡萄汁旁边
不知道怎么会跑去那里

translation.en: Are those my note cards that I've been working all night on?
translation.zh:
这些就是我昨天
花了一晚做的卡片吗？

translation.en: I've been up all night and now they're all sticky.
translation.zh:
我一夜没睡才作出来的
它们怎么都粘在一起了

translation.en: -Sorry, baby. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 抱歉 宝贝 是啊

translation.en: -Sorry. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-嗯

translation.en: -Bye-bye. -Yeah, I'll see you later.
translation.zh:
-再见
-嗯 待会儿见

translation.en: -Don't forget about the orientation today. -The what?
translation.zh: 别忘了今天是新生介绍日 什么？

translation.en: Chapman Academy? The preschool?
translation.zh: 查普曼学院？托儿所？

translation.en: Okay. Right. Is there any way we could reschedule that?
translation.zh: 好吧 能不能换个时间？

translation.en: Maybe we shouldn't.
translation.zh: 也许不用换

translation.en: Maybe we should take care of business and be responsible parents.
translation.zh: 也许我们该努力工作 做称职的父母

translation.en: Don't worry.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: -Don't be late. -I will not be late.
translation.zh: 别迟到了 不会的

translation.en: Promise?
translation.zh: 你保证？

translation.en: I won't be late.
translation.zh: 我不会迟到的

translation.en: See you later.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -Did he promise? -He sure did.
translation.zh: 他保证了吗？ 当然

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: Your worst nightmare.
translation.zh: 糟糕透了

translation.en: What? Mr. Broccoli's a no-show.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-西兰花先生没有来

translation.en: He got a call-back on a potato chip commercial.
translation.zh: 他被叫回去拍一个薯片广告了

translation.en: -These snack foods are killing us! -Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 那些快餐食品真是要了我的命！ 是的 我知道

translation.en: Marvin!
translation.zh: 马文！

translation.en: Yeah?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: The guy who smells the mail?
translation.zh: 那个喜欢闻邮件的家伙？

translation.en: We need a guy to wear a broccoli suit, not a normal guy.
translation.zh:
听着 我们要个穿西兰花服装的家伙
不是要个正常的家伙

translation.en: Marvin, my man!
translation.zh: 马文 伙计！老朋友 马文

translation.en: My friend, Marvin. What's going on today? Listen, I need a favor.
translation.zh: 马文 伙计！老朋友 马文 今天好吗？能帮个忙吗？

translation.en: We're having a focus group and the broccoli guy left.
translation.zh: 我们正要拍个片子 演西兰花的家伙跑了

translation.en: I was wondering if you'd put the suit on and cover for us?
translation.zh: 演西兰花的家伙跑了 我在想你能不能顶替一下？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不行

translation.en: I can't do the broccoli because it's just not me. Sorry.
translation.zh:
我不能演西兰花
因为我不像西兰花 抱歉

translation.en: Can I be the carrot, though?
translation.zh: 但我可以演胡萝卜吗？

translation.en: Yeah, you could be the carrot.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: -Let him try your carrot on. -No.
translation.zh:
-让他试穿你的胡萝卜服
-不行

translation.en: -You'll be the broccoli. -I don't want to be a bush.
translation.zh: 你可以演西兰花 我可不想演一簇菜头

translation.en: It's not a bush, it's a stalk. A strong stalk of broccoli.
translation.zh: 不是一簇 而是一株 一大株西兰花

translation.en: -I'm pretty strong. -You can make that work.
translation.zh: 我就够大 那你就能行

translation.en: Let's switch this suit and get the broccoli.
translation.zh: 你快换掉这衣服 去穿西兰花服装

translation.en: Trust me on this. Let's go.
translation.zh: 相信我 走吧

translation.en: B-R-O-C-C-O-L-I!
translation.zh: 西兰花！

translation.en: I am the broccoli and don't know why!
translation.zh: 西兰花先生就是我

translation.en: C-A-R-R-O and a T!
translation.zh: 胡萝还有“卜”

translation.en: Carrots are healthy for you and me!
translation.zh: 胡萝卜营养多多多！

translation.en: You want to do the dance? Go Broccoli, it's your birthday!
translation.zh:
你们想跳舞吗？跳啊 西兰花先生
今天是你的生日！ 跳啊 西兰花先生
今天是你的生日！

translation.en: -Go Carrot, go Carrot, go! -No, I don't want to.
translation.zh: 跳啊 胡萝卜先生 跳啊！ 不 我不想跳

translation.en: Hello, boys and girls!
translation.zh: 孩子们！

translation.en: Zowie! Do we have a special treat for you today!
translation.zh: 哇塞！今天给你们的可是特别早餐啊

translation.en: "Hey! We have a brand-new cereal!
translation.zh: “一种全新的麦片！”

translation.en: "You're the first kid...."
translation.zh: “你们是第一批…”

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: It's super yummy.
translation.zh: 味道太好了 富含…

translation.en: -And loaded... -Phil, help me.
translation.zh: 味道太好了 富含… 费尔 帮帮我！

translation.en: ...with all sorts of stuff that's good for you.
translation.zh: 各种对你们身体有益的物质

translation.en: And do you know what we call it?
translation.zh: 知道我们管它叫什么吗？

translation.en: Veggie-Os!
translation.zh: 蔬菜粒！

translation.en: This cereal sucks!
translation.zh: 这麦片真难吃！

translation.en: They're turning on us.
translation.zh: 他们开始发火了

translation.en: Give it a chance. Let it get in their mouth. They got to taste it.
translation.zh: 再试试 给他们吃点 他们该多尝尝

translation.en: Take that!
translation.zh: 不 给你这个！

translation.en: Help me, Charlie!
translation.zh: 帮帮我 查理！

translation.en: Not in the face! Save yourself, Carrot!
translation.zh:
别弄我脸上！
你自己救自己吧 胡萝卜！

translation.en: Call security now. Stop that!
translation.zh: 快叫警卫 住手！

translation.en: I guess we better go in, Pooch. Your Daddy will come a little later.
translation.zh: 我看我们还是进去吧 你爸爸过会儿才会来

translation.en: Come here, let me see you.
translation.zh: 进来 让我看看你

translation.en: I am so sorry, baby.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 宝贝

translation.en: Things got crazy at work. What's going on, man?
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 宝贝 工作中出了点问题 你好吗 宝贝？

translation.en: Look at this place. It's Princeton for preschoolers.
translation.zh:
嗨 看看这地方
简直是托儿所里的普林斯顿

translation.en: Let's hurry up so we won't be late for the orientation.
translation.zh: 快点 新生介绍会要迟到了

translation.en: What's the orientation about?
translation.zh: 介绍谢什么东西？

translation.en: It's a preschool, they'll be playing with blocks, right?
translation.zh: 只是托儿所 不过是玩玩积木罢了 是的

translation.en: Unbelievable.
translation.zh: 不可思议

translation.en: Language skills are a critical component here at Chapman.
translation.zh:
语言技能的训练在查普曼
是很重要的组成部分

translation.en: They're part of our core curriculum.
translation.zh: 它们是我们的核心课程之一

translation.en: You must be Charles.
translation.zh: 你一定是查理

translation.en: -Call me Charlie. Nice to meet you. -How do you do?
translation.zh: 叫我查理吧 幸会

translation.en: -This is my wife, Kim. -Hi.
translation.zh:
你好 -我妻子 金
-嗨

translation.en: Kimberly. I'm Miss Harridan, the headmistress.
translation.zh: 金伯利 我是何瑞顿 这里的女校长

translation.en: And this is Ben.
translation.zh: 这一定是本

translation.en: How do you do, Benjamin?
translation.zh: 你好啊 本杰明

translation.en: -Come on, little man. -It's a pleasure to meet you.
translation.zh: 来啊 小家伙 很高兴认识你们

translation.en: Shall we begin?
translation.zh: 可以开始吗？

translation.en: -Look at their outfits. I like that. -They're cute.
translation.zh: 看看这些设备 我喜欢 很不错

translation.en: We find uniforms reinforce the sense of structure.
translation.zh: 我们发现制服能增强组织性

translation.en: Structure's good.
translation.zh: 组织性很重要

translation.en: Our philosophy is that a child is like a climbing vine.
translation.zh: 我们的观点是 孩子就像攀爬的植物

translation.en: With structure to cling to, and the right gardener to tend them...
translation.zh: 只要给合适的支架 辅以优秀的园丁

translation.en: they'll grow to the sky.
translation.zh: 他们会直上蓝天

translation.en: -Sorry. -So, Mrs. Hinton...
translation.zh: 抱歉 欣顿夫人 你要重新回去工作？

translation.en: you're returning to work?
translation.zh: 欣顿夫人 你要重新回去工作？

translation.en: Lawyer, I believe your file said.
translation.zh: 是律师吧 你档案上这么写

translation.en: Actually, I haven't practiced yet.
translation.zh: 实际上 我还没开始上班

translation.en: We just had Ben when I finished law school.
translation.zh: 我法学院毕业的时候 正怀着本

translation.en: Still a little nervous about leaving him.
translation.zh: 离开他还是有点紧张

translation.en: All mothers are. But you needn't worry.
translation.zh: 妈妈都这样 别担心

translation.en: Our little seedlings are in very good hands.
translation.zh: 我们会好好照顾这些小树苗的

translation.en: -Turn the darn phone off. -It's off.
translation.zh: 关掉电话 关了

translation.en: And attack!
translation.zh: 打！

translation.en: Now mark your books, number five.
translation.zh: 在书上记下来 第五条

translation.en: Cat is to mouse as frog is to....
translation.zh: 猫对于老鼠就像青蛙对于…

translation.en: Are they doing SAT prep?
translation.zh: 他们这是准备能力测验吗？

translation.en: It's never too early to start.
translation.zh: 未雨绸缪嘛

translation.en: -Nest. -That's right. Nest.
translation.zh: 巢 对了 巢

translation.en: -I thought you turned your phone off. -It's not my phone, it's my two-way.
translation.zh: 你不是已经关了电话了吗？ 不是电话 是双向传呼机

translation.en: This is bad.
translation.zh: 真糟糕

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 去吧

translation.en: Okay. Thank you, baby.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 宝贝

translation.en: I am terribly sorry. I have an emergency at work. I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我很抱歉 公司有点急事 我得走了

translation.en: -I understand. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
-我理解
-抱歉

translation.en: Hey, little man.
translation.zh: 嗨 小家伙

translation.en: Daddy's got to get going, but I'll see you later on, okay?
translation.zh: 老爸要走了 待会见 好吗？

translation.en: You want to do the rocket ship?
translation.zh: 你想玩火箭船吗？

translation.en: Let's do the rocket ship.
translation.zh: 我们来玩火箭船

translation.en: Sorry about all the noise.
translation.zh: 抱歉吵到你们了

translation.en: Here you go. Go to Mommy.
translation.zh: 好了 到妈妈那去吧

translation.en: I'll see you later. Thank you for your time.
translation.zh: 再见 谢谢你的介绍

translation.en: I'm so sorry. He's trying out a new product at work.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 他正在搞一个新产品

translation.en: No need to apologize. Diligence always sets a fine example.
translation.zh: 不用道歉 勤勉的父母会是好榜样

translation.en: Jenny. Just in time.
translation.zh: 詹妮 来得正好

translation.en: Here's a copy of our curriculum...
translation.zh: 这是我们的课程表

translation.en: and a list of your financial obligations.
translation.zh: 还有费用清单

translation.en: This is the price per year?
translation.zh: 一年这么多？

translation.en: Per month.
translation.zh: 一个月

translation.en: -Ben is starting preschool today. -Where at?
translation.zh: 本今天开始上托儿所了 哪里？

translation.en: Over at that Chapman Academy.
translation.zh: 查普曼学校

translation.en: The Marine Corps of day care. Max goes there.
translation.zh: 托儿所里的海军陆战队训练营 马克思也上那里

translation.en: Really? What do you think of that place?
translation.zh: 真的吗？你觉得那里如何？

translation.en: There isn't much choice. You got Harridan and her merry fembots...
translation.zh: 没什么可选择的 要么选何瑞顿和她的机器人教师…

translation.en: or Idiot von Idiot and their School for Children Who Like Accidents.
translation.zh: 要么就是那些白痴开的总有孩子 受伤的学校

translation.en: Numbers just came in for Chocolatey Chocolate Balls.
translation.zh:
伙计们 “巧克来”
巧克力大获成功了

translation.en: Through the roof!
translation.zh: 销量疯涨！

translation.en: That's a surprise. You hear that? Kids like chocolate.
translation.zh:
真是个惊喜 你听到了吗？
孩子们喜欢巧克力

translation.en: Ice cream, too.
translation.zh: 还有冰淇淋

translation.en: I forgot I was talking to the granola-heads from the natural food division.
translation.zh: 我忘了我是在和天然食品部的 白痴讲话了

translation.en: What was the stinker you got saddled with?
translation.zh: 你们负责的那垃圾叫什么来的？

translation.en: It's not a stinker. It's Veggie-Os, the cereal of the future.
translation.zh: 不是垃圾 是蔬菜粒麦片 未来的麦片

translation.en: Right, Veggie-blows. I thought they were killing that.
translation.zh:
是了 蔬菜粒垃圾
他们已经把这项目砍了

translation.en: Jerry!
translation.zh: 杰瑞！

translation.en: The numbers on the Chocolatey Chocolate Balls are through the roof!
translation.zh:
看了“巧克来”巧克力豆的
销量数据了吗？ 销量创新高了！

translation.en: What does he mean, "killing that"?
translation.zh: 你说“砍掉”了是什么意思？

translation.en: Why you listening to Bruce? Nothing's being killed. He's a clown.
translation.zh:
你为什么听布鲁斯的？
没什么被砍掉了 你知道他是个小丑

translation.en: If something was going down, we'd know.
translation.zh: 如果要砍什么 我们该知道的

translation.en: We're killing it.
translation.zh: 是砍掉了

translation.en: Come on, Jim. We had one bad test. It's a hard nut to crack.
translation.zh:
吉姆 我们已经有了
一次失败的尝试了 这事很难搞定

translation.en: Any fool can sell Chocolatey Chocolate Balls...
translation.zh: 随便那个傻瓜都能卖巧克力豆

translation.en: and cotton candy-flavored cereal to kids.
translation.zh: 或者棉花糖口味的麦片给孩子

translation.en: Cotton candy. That's not bad.
translation.zh: 棉花糖 这主意不错

translation.en: Guys, look. I'm sorry, but it was a dog.
translation.zh:
伙计们 听着抱歉
但表演确实很糟糕

translation.en: Kids just don't want to eat vegetables for breakfast. Who knew?
translation.zh: 孩子们早餐不喜欢吃蔬菜？

translation.en: I told you that six months ago when you put us on this project.
translation.zh:
六个月前
你让我们在做这个项目的时候 我就告诉过你了

translation.en: You did?
translation.zh: 有吗？

translation.en: It's not just Veggie-Os.
translation.zh: 不仅仅是蔬菜粒麦片

translation.en: We're shutting down the whole health division.
translation.zh: 我们要关掉整个健康食品部

translation.en: That's like 300 people.
translation.zh: 那要有300人失业

translation.en: It's not a business we want to be in.
translation.zh: 我们可不想卷进去

translation.en: Where are we being reassigned?
translation.zh: 那要安排我们去哪里？

translation.en: Pooch, how was your first day at school?
translation.zh: 今天第一天感觉如何？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 还行

translation.en: Just okay?
translation.zh: 只是还行？

translation.en: I don't know anybody there.
translation.zh: 我一个人也不认识

translation.en: Give it some time. You'll make some friends.
translation.zh: 时间长了 你会交到朋友的

translation.en: How was your day, baby?
translation.zh: 宝贝 你今天过得如何？

translation.en: I lost my J-O-B.
translation.zh: 我失业了

translation.en: You lost your J-O-B?
translation.zh: 你失业了？

translation.en: I got F-I-R-E-D.
translation.zh: 我被解雇了

translation.en: Me and 300 other people.
translation.zh: 还有其他300个同事

translation.en: They cannot do that!
translation.zh: 他们怎么能这样！

translation.en: -Can't Jim Fields do something? -He's the one that pulled the trigger.
translation.zh: 吉姆 菲尔兹没帮忙吗？ 他就是刽子手

translation.en: He's not gonna do anything.
translation.zh: 他才不会做什么

translation.en: When I found out it was him, I told him to take a flying--
translation.zh: 我发现是他的时候 我叫他去…

translation.en: Charlie!
translation.zh: 查理！

translation.en: H-I-J-K-L-M-N-O-P.
translation.zh: 哈哈

translation.en: Don't worry about this.
translation.zh: 别担心

translation.en: I'm in demand, and I'll have a new job in a week.
translation.zh: 我很抢手 一周后就会找到工作的 一周

translation.en: What if we use the emergency fund?
translation.zh: 如果我们用储备金 怎么样？

translation.en: We can't. We already used it on the car payment.
translation.zh:
不行
我们已经用来付汽车的分期付款了

translation.en: There's no way around it.
translation.zh: 没办法了

translation.en: We gotta pull Ben out of Chapman. It's too much money.
translation.zh: 必须让本从查普曼退学 太贵了

translation.en: What will we do for child-care?
translation.zh: 那我们来照顾孩子吗？

translation.en: -Are you gonna stay home with him? -No, I'm not gonna stay home with him.
translation.zh: 你会待在家里陪他？ 不 我不要

translation.en: We just gotta find something more affordable, that's all.
translation.zh: 我们去找些便宜的地方

translation.en: -This is the right address. -You gotta be kidding me.
translation.zh: 就这里了 你开玩笑

translation.en: -We can at least check it out. -Ben is not going here.
translation.zh: 起码该看看 本不能待在这里

translation.en: Looks can be deceiving. I'll go look.
translation.zh: 外表有时是会骗人的 我去看看

translation.en: Looks can be deceiving? We're in a trailer park!
translation.zh:
外表有时是会骗人的？
这简直是停车场！

translation.en: I'm looking for the preschool.
translation.zh: 我可能搞错了 我在找托儿所

translation.en: Yes, it is.
translation.zh: 这里就是

translation.en: Welcome to the....
translation.zh: 欢迎来到…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Welcome to the Touch of Eden Preschool.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到“乐园”托儿所

translation.en: -Can I help you? -No, thank you.
translation.zh: 要帮忙吗？ 不 谢谢

translation.en: -Is this the right address, here? -I think so.
translation.zh: 是这里吗？ 我想是的

translation.en: We keep the children right around here.
translation.zh: 你好 我们让孩子们待在这里

translation.en: Go ahead. After you, ma'am.
translation.zh: 进去啊 妈妈请先

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Where'd you get this address? -You picked this place.
translation.zh: 你哪里找来的这些地方？ 是你挑的

translation.en: We should report this to somebody.
translation.zh: 我们也许该报警

translation.en: That's what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 我也这么想

translation.en: I knew there had to be at least one decent place.
translation.zh: 我知道至少会有一个体面的地方

translation.en: It looks all right.
translation.zh:
-看来不错
-是的

translation.en: This is the police. We have you surrounded.
translation.zh: 我们是警察 你们被包围了

translation.en: All right, Charlie. Give up the keys.
translation.zh: 好吧 查理把钥匙交出来

translation.en: I don't know where the keys are.
translation.zh: 我不知道钥匙在哪儿

translation.en: Don't even try it.
translation.zh: 想都别想

translation.en: -Why don't you drive the minivan? -No. We talked about this last night.
translation.zh: 我不知道奔驰车钥匙在哪儿 你为什么不开迷你车？ 不 我们昨晚已经讨论过了

translation.en: You're staying home with Ben. I'm driving the Mercedes.
translation.zh: 你待在家里照看本 我开奔驰车

translation.en: You have me driving around town in the dumb minivan all day.
translation.zh: 你让我整天开那丑陋的迷你车上街

translation.en: Is the top down?
translation.zh: 车蓬放下来了吗？

translation.en: You know what, Kim?
translation.zh: 你知道吗 金？

translation.en: Be careful. Don't just park it anyplace.
translation.zh: 小心 别乱停车

translation.en: Be careful getting in and out of the car. Don't get any dings in the door.
translation.zh: 上下车要小心 别刮坏了车门

translation.en: Come here.
translation.zh: 到这儿来

translation.en: Make sure you put good gas in there. If you put in the cheap stuff...
translation.zh: 汽油要用正宗的 如果用了便宜货

translation.en: the engine will start knocking, and I don't want that.
translation.zh: 发动机会咔哒作响 我不想那样

translation.en: You don't leave milk in the car with the windows rolled up.
translation.zh: 车窗关起来时 别把牛奶留在车里

translation.en: Always buckle up the car seat.
translation.zh: 别忘系安全带

translation.en: Don't park in the sun or the seats will get too hot.
translation.zh: 别把车停在太阳下 坐垫会发烫的

translation.en: And no juice unless it's in a sippy cup.
translation.zh: 还有别在车里喝果汁 除非是吸管杯

translation.en: Bye, baby.
translation.zh: 再见 宝贝

translation.en: Can you give a call, tell us what time you'll be back?
translation.zh: 你能打电话告诉我下班的时间吗？

translation.en: Because we'll be here waiting, just the two of us.
translation.zh: 因为我们都在等 我们俩

translation.en: Bye, Mom.
translation.zh: 再见 妈妈

translation.en: Not too fast!
translation.zh: 别太快！

translation.en: See you later.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: When's Mommy coming back?
translation.zh: 妈妈什么时候回来？

translation.en: She'll be back around dinnertime, Mommy.
translation.zh: 她会再吃晚饭时回来的

translation.en: Is dinnertime soon?
translation.zh: 很快就吃晚饭吗？

translation.en: No, but don't you worry. We're going to have a lot of fun.
translation.zh: 不是 但别担心 我们会很开心的

translation.en: But we need Mommy to have fun.
translation.zh: 有妈妈在才开心

translation.en: Are you trying to just break me down in the driveway?
translation.zh: 哇 你在车道上就想让我伤心吗？

translation.en: -Why you want to break your father down? -I'm sorry.
translation.zh:
你想让你老爸伤心？ -抱歉
-那还差不多

translation.en: That's better. You broke me down smooth.
translation.zh:
-抱歉
-那还差不多 还不是太伤心 我的眼睛肿了…

translation.en: -My eyes welled up. -I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 还不是太伤心 我的眼睛肿了… 抱歉

translation.en: -You made my eyes well up. -Okay, let's--
translation.zh: 你让我眼睛肿了

translation.en: -Look at my eyes. -I see your eye twitching.
translation.zh: 看我的眼睛 你的眼睛在眨巴

translation.en: We're going to have fun!
translation.zh: 我们会开心的！

translation.en: Do you know how to change a diaper?
translation.zh: 你会换尿布吗？

translation.en: Yes, but I thought Max was potty-trained.
translation.zh:
是的 但马克思
不是会自己上厕所了吗？

translation.en: Believe me, so did I.
translation.zh: 相信我 我原来也这么认为

translation.en: Don't do that to me! What are you....
translation.zh: 别这样！你在干…

translation.en: He's throwing things at me, and it smells.
translation.zh: 他在向我扔脏东西 真臭

translation.en: I really need your help!
translation.zh: 我真的要你帮忙！

translation.en: -Are you potty-trained? -Yes.
translation.zh:
-你会自己上厕所吗？
-会

translation.en: You got to go stinky? Yes.
translation.zh:
-你要去拉臭臭吗？
-是的

translation.en: Then, go on. Go stinky, then.
translation.zh: 那快去吧

translation.en: You have a nauseous ache in your stomach that you're a worthless failure?
translation.zh:
当你觉得自己
是你一个一文不值的废物 你感到难过吗？

translation.en: We are worthless failures.
translation.zh: 我们都一文不值

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 嗨 各位

translation.en: -Hey, Peggy. How you doing? -Good.
translation.zh:
-嘿 培姬你好吗？
-很好

translation.en: What's going on, Nicky?
translation.zh: 怎么了 尼基？

translation.en: He can be a little hard to understand sometimes.
translation.zh: 他有时候难以理解

translation.en: Honey, go play. Have a good time, have fun.
translation.zh: 宝贝 去玩吧 玩得开心点

translation.en: Stay away from that cat poop.
translation.zh: 别碰那些猫屎

translation.en: -Hija? What'd he just say? -God, I haven't a clue.
translation.zh: 咿呀？他说什么？ 我也不知道

translation.en: The doctor says it's just a phase, but....
translation.zh: 医生说只是阶段性的 但…

translation.en: It kept him out of Chapman.
translation.zh: 他们让他从查普曼退学了

translation.en: Jerks.
translation.zh: 混蛋

translation.en: Put that mouse down!
translation.zh: 马克斯！把老鼠放下！

translation.en: Give it to me!
translation.zh: 给我！

translation.en: What are you....
translation.zh: 你在干什么…

translation.en: Charlie, I think it's great, you guys being full-time dads.
translation.zh: 查理 你们做全职老爸 真得不错

translation.en: We're real giants among men.
translation.zh: 我们是男人中的男人

translation.en: You are. You should be proud. Most guys don't know who their kids are.
translation.zh: 当然是 你们该骄傲 大多数男人不知道他们的孩子在哪儿

translation.en: Joe still hasn't found anything?
translation.zh: 乔还没找到工作？

translation.en: No, and he's driving me crazy.
translation.zh: 没 他真让我发疯

translation.en: I should go back to work, but what about Nicky?
translation.zh: 我该重新工作 但尼基怎么办？

translation.en: Dead mouse.
translation.zh: 死耗子

translation.en: There's no good alternative to Chapman.
translation.zh: 除了查普曼 没有其它什么选择

translation.en: If someone opened a decent day care program here, they'd make a killing.
translation.zh:
如果有人 在这里开个体面的托儿所
一定会发大财

translation.en: Nicky, what did I say about the cat poop?
translation.zh: 尼基 我不是叫你别碰猫屎的吗？

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: A day care center? You and me?
translation.zh: 托儿所？你和我？

translation.en: It's a completely underserved market. Harridan has a monopoly on this suburb.
translation.zh: 这个市场提供的服务远远不够 何瑞顿垄断了这里

translation.en: All we have to do is come in...
translation.zh: 我们只要杀入市场

translation.en: establish ourselves as the value alternative, and we'll clean up!
translation.zh:
把我们包装成一个有价值的选择
我们一定会发大财！

translation.en: -You think I'd be good at child-care? -Absolutely.
translation.zh: 你认为我擅长看孩子吗？ 当然

translation.en: Excuse me? Are these your kids?
translation.zh: 抱歉？是你们的孩子吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不是

translation.en: -Remember when you broke my yo-yo? -I did not break your yo-yo.
translation.zh: 记得你曾弄坏我的溜溜球吗？ 我没弄坏过你的溜溜球吧？

translation.en: -Yes, you did. -I did not break your yo-yo.
translation.zh: 你有 没有 你的溜溜球本来就是坏的

translation.en: Your yo-yo was broke.
translation.zh: 没有 你的溜溜球本来就是坏的

translation.en: You're killing me. You're really killing me.
translation.zh: 你真让我受不了

translation.en: I'm home!
translation.zh: 我回来了！

translation.en: -You said let's do this together. -No, Daddy!
translation.zh:
-你说让我们一起玩的
-不 老爸！

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.zh:
-你现在说我让你受不了
-怎么回事？

translation.en: A day care center. In our house?
translation.zh: 日托中心 在我们家？

translation.en: Yes, Phil's apartment's only a two-bedroom place.
translation.zh: 是的 费尔的公寓太小 只有两间房间

translation.en: This is crazy on 10 different levels.
translation.zh: 查理 不管怎么看都是个疯狂的主意

translation.en: What do you both know about running a day care?
translation.zh: 你俩对办托儿所有多了解？

translation.en: It's not rocket science.
translation.zh: 没那么复杂 我们申请个执照

translation.en: We applied for a license. It couldn't be any more simple.
translation.zh: 没那么复杂 我们申请个执照 再简单不过了

translation.en: -Daddy. -What you want? The rocket ship?
translation.zh: 老爸 是要玩火箭飞船吗？

translation.en: -That's what you wanted, right? -Milk.
translation.zh: 你要的是这个吗？ 是要喝牛奶

translation.en: You wanted milk? I'm sorry. He wanted milk.
translation.zh: 你要喝牛奶？抱歉 他要牛奶

translation.en: Rocket man needs milk when he's flying. It's for strong bones, in case you crash.
translation.zh:
火箭人飞行的时候要喝牛奶 能增强骨骼
摔下来的时候就会不受伤

translation.en: We understand each other. What you think about this?
translation.zh: 我们能互相了解 你看怎么样？

translation.en: We're talking about other people's kids. Do you understand that responsibility?
translation.zh: 我们谈的是别人的孩子 你知道责任重大吗？

translation.en: I'll be just as careful with them as I am with Ben.
translation.zh: 我会像和本在一起一样小心的

translation.en: Don't be rubbing your head into stuff. Watch where you're walking.
translation.zh: 别拿脑袋撞东西 走路时要看路

translation.en: What about when you get a real job? Just leave the parents hanging?
translation.zh: 如果你找到正式工作了呢？ 把那些父母撇到一边？

translation.en: We'll cross that bridge when we get to it.
translation.zh: 车到山前必有路

translation.en: It won't be permanent.
translation.zh: 这不会长久的

translation.en: We won't get rich from this, but it might keep us out of bankruptcy.
translation.zh:
我们也许不会发财
但至少能让我们不破产

translation.en: -I don't know, Charlie. -Come on, Kim.
translation.zh:
-我不知道 查理
-拜托 金

translation.en: I can't just sit around here. I got to try to do something.
translation.zh: 我只是不能闲在家里 我要做些事情

translation.en: Come on. I need this.
translation.zh: 求你了 让我试试

translation.en: I guess you better start handing out those fliers.
translation.zh: 我想最好从发传单开始

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -It makes much more sense-- -Me, too.
translation.zh:
-这才差不多…
-我也要

translation.en: Okay, you want me to give you a hug?
translation.zh: 好吧 你想我抱你吗？

translation.en: Here's a big hug. Group hug.
translation.zh: 我们一起抱抱

translation.en: Excuse me. When you get a chance....
translation.zh: 抱歉 如果您有意…

translation.en: Here you go, Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: 拿好了 奶爸安亲班

translation.en: Hey, little karate guy. Daddy Day Care, karate girl.
translation.zh:
嘿 空手道小子 奶爸安亲班
空手道丫头

translation.en: Hello! Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: 你好！奶爸安亲班

translation.en: Hello, how are you?
translation.zh:
-你好吗？
-嗨

translation.en: Here you go. If you get a chance....
translation.zh: 给您 如果您有意…

translation.en: When you get a chance, have a look at that. Thank you.
translation.zh: 如果您有意 请看一下 谢谢

translation.en: If it's not too much trouble, when you get a chance....
translation.zh: 如果不嫌麻烦 看一下…

translation.en: "Warm, nurturing, experienced parents...
translation.zh: “热心 富教育性 有经验的家长

translation.en: "providing exceptional child-care at affordable prices."
translation.zh: 以合理的价格提供优质的日托”

translation.en: The "experienced" part is what I have to take issue with.
translation.zh:
“有经验”这部分
就是我觉得有问题的

translation.en: I give it three days.
translation.zh: 实际上才三天

translation.en: You two guys are running a day care center?
translation.zh: 你们两个办托儿所？

translation.en: You're signing up people at a lemonade stand on the front lawn?
translation.zh: 在门前的草坪上摆张桌子就报名？

translation.en: Good luck with that. Come on, Paul.
translation.zh: 祝你们好运 走吧 保罗

translation.en: Wait. Don't you believe in equality amongst the sexes?
translation.zh: 等等 你不相信性别平等？

translation.en: Can't men do everything women can do?
translation.zh: 男人做不了女人做的事情？

translation.en: No, we can't. It's unnatural.
translation.zh: 不能 那是违法自然规律的

translation.en: Little bit eeky.
translation.zh: 有点让人反感

translation.en: You're guys?
translation.zh: 你们是男人？

translation.en: What did you think Daddy Day Care meant?
translation.zh:
那你以为“奶爸安亲班”
是什么意思？

translation.en: I thought maybe one guy. Not only guys.
translation.zh: 我以为有个男的 而不全是男的

translation.en: I just thought it was a clever name.
translation.zh: 我以为只是个有趣的名字

translation.en: -Is this the day care place? -They're all guys.
translation.zh: 托儿所就是这里吗？ 他们是男的 都是男的

translation.en: They're what?
translation.zh: 他们什么？

translation.en: Excuse me. Listen. We are two loving, caring parents.
translation.zh:
听着 我们是两个有爱心
会关心人的家长

translation.en: We run a day care center.
translation.zh: 我们开办日托中心

translation.en: You're a couple of sickos!
translation.zh: 你们两个变态！

translation.en: How about a free trial offer?
translation.zh: 免费试一试如何？

translation.en: Sickos!
translation.zh: 变态！

translation.en: -Oh, dear. -Come on!
translation.zh: 亲爱的 走！

translation.en: Hi, Peggy! Hi, Nicky. How you doing?
translation.zh: 嗨 培姬！嗨 尼基 你好吗？

translation.en: Nicky is so excited for his big day.
translation.zh: 尼基对他这个大日子很兴奋

translation.en: -How old are you? Oh, yeah, five. -I got it.
translation.zh: 你多大了？哦 五岁 我明白了

translation.en: Wait. You're leaving Nicky here with these guys?
translation.zh: 等等 你要把尼基留给这两个家伙？

translation.en: You have trouble with them being guys? Are you from the Dark Ages?
translation.zh: 他们是男人有什么问题吗？ 你是从黑暗年代来的吗？

translation.en: Aren't you for gender equality and all that jazz?
translation.zh: 你们不是主张男女平等这类东西吗？

translation.en: Peggy, come on. Of course we are.
translation.zh: 培姬 我们当然主张

translation.en: So can't women do what men do and men do what women do?
translation.zh: 那为什么男女不能互换角色？

translation.en: These guys can do the job.
translation.zh: 这些男人能做好

translation.en: -You'll vouch for these two? -Yeah, I'll vouch for them.
translation.zh: 你帮他们两个担保？ 是的 我担保

translation.en: -I'll try it. -You're doing it?
translation.zh: 那我试试吧 你呢？

translation.en: They'll have a great time.
translation.zh: 他们会很开心的

translation.en: -Okay. -Right, kids?
translation.zh:
-好吧
-对吗 孩子们？

translation.en: You're a real lifesaver.
translation.zh: 你真是及时雨

translation.en: You screw this up, I'll kill you with my bare hands.
translation.zh:
如果你们搞砸了
我就把你们的脖子扭断

translation.en: -Here, now, go to Phil. -No, I don't want to go.
translation.zh: 到了 和费尔去吧 不 我不想去

translation.en: -Come on. Let go. -I don't want to go!
translation.zh: 放手啊 我不想去！

translation.en: He's got a little bit of separation anxiety.
translation.zh: 他有点分离焦虑症

translation.en: -Dylan! -I don't want to go!
translation.zh: 德兰！ 我不想去！

translation.en: -I just stopped breastfeeding. -I'd freak out, too.
translation.zh: 我刚停止喂奶 我的身体也变形了

translation.en: -If you could grab a leg. -I don't want to go.
translation.zh: 能不能帮我抓一下腿？ 我不想去

translation.en: -All right. -Here we go.
translation.zh: 好吧 来吧

translation.en: -Here we go. -Come on, Dylan.
translation.zh:
-好了
-别这样 德兰

translation.en: -All right, sweetie. -I don't want to go.
translation.zh:
-好吧 宝贝
-我不想去 好吧

translation.en: Come on. Let go of Mom!
translation.zh: 放开… 放开妈妈！

translation.en: Thank you. Oh, man.
translation.zh: 放开 谢谢你

translation.en: -No lactose, no peanuts, no shellfish. -Nothing high in fructose.
translation.zh: 不能吃乳糖 花生和贝壳类动物 所有含果糖的东西都不行

translation.en: -Or sucrose or dextrose. -Or maltodextrose.
translation.zh: 蔗糖 葡萄糖也不行 还有麦芽糊精

translation.en: -Nothing with red dye number six. -Or number four.
translation.zh: 还有不能吃红染色值为6的食品 还有染色值为4的

translation.en: Or yellow dye number two.
translation.zh: 或者黄染色值为2的

translation.en: Will you say "maltodextrose" for me again? So cute.
translation.zh: 能再说一遍麦芽糊精吗？真可爱

translation.en: Maltodextrose.
translation.zh: 麦芽糊精

translation.en: -Or yellow dye number two. -Two, right.
translation.zh: 麦芽糊精 黄染色值为2 2 好的

translation.en: His name's Crispin.
translation.zh: 他叫奎斯品

translation.en: My man, Crispin! How's it going, big guy?
translation.zh: 伙计！你好吗 大个子？

translation.en: What time's pickup?
translation.zh: 接孩子的时间是几点？
下午五点

translation.en: I have laser treatment. Make it 6:00.
translation.zh: 我要进行激光治疗 六点吧

translation.en: Sorry about the outfit. He won't take it off.
translation.zh:
关于这打扮 我很抱歉
他不肯脱下来

translation.en: How long has he been wearing that?
translation.zh: 穿了多少时间了？

translation.en: Couple of weeks.
translation.zh: 几个星期了

translation.en: Who will you call if there are any problems?
translation.zh: 有问题打什么电话 知道吗？

translation.en: 911, Mommy.
translation.zh: 911 妈妈

translation.en: That's such a good girl.
translation.zh: 真是个好姑娘

translation.en: Come on. I'll let you hold my keys.
translation.zh: 我让你拿我的钥匙

translation.en: How about a Life Saver? You like Life Savers?
translation.zh:
我们来扮救生员好吗？
你喜欢救生员吗？

translation.en: How about money? A dollar?
translation.zh: 钱怎么样？一美元？

translation.en: A dollar.
translation.zh: 一美元

translation.en: You are a smart man. That is yours. All right.
translation.zh: 你很聪明 归你了

translation.en: Welcome to Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到 奶爸安亲班

translation.en: We're your team facilitators. My name is Charlie and this is Phil.
translation.zh:
我们是你们的队长
我是查理他是费尔

translation.en: Anybody ever seen a mission statement before?
translation.zh: 有谁以前见过行动说明？

translation.en: Here. Everybody take one. Take a mission statement.
translation.zh: 每个人拿一张

translation.en: Here we go. One for everybody. Slow down.
translation.zh:
-给我
-给你们 每个人都有 慢一点

translation.en: All right. Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Who wants to be first one to read the first sentence...
translation.zh: 谁想念行动说明的

translation.en: on the mission statement?
translation.zh: 第一句？

translation.en: Okay, how about you?
translation.zh: 你行吗？

translation.en: I don't read yet.
translation.zh: 我不认识字

translation.en: I'm looking for someone who can read.
translation.zh: 谁认识字？

translation.en: By a show of hands, how many of you can already read?
translation.zh: 认识字的请举手？

translation.en: Raise your hand if you don't know how to read.
translation.zh: 不认识的举手

translation.en: Here's what we'll do.
translation.zh: 那好吧

translation.en: I'll read the mission statement aloud...
translation.zh: 我来大声念

translation.en: and what I want you guys to do is just follow along as I read it.
translation.zh: 我念的时候 你们跟着我念

translation.en: Doesn't that sound like interesting fun? Here we go.
translation.zh: 是不是很有趣啊 开始了

translation.en: "As the members and facilitators of the Daddy Day Care team...
translation.zh:
“作为奶爸日托
行动小组的成员和队长

translation.en: "we will collectively strive to provide...."
translation.zh: 我们将共同致力于提供…”

translation.en: Sean, don't eat the mission statement. Get that out of your mouth.
translation.zh: 肖恩 别吃纸 从嘴里拿出来

translation.en: "...will collectively strive to...."
translation.zh: “共同致力于”

translation.en: Don't rip the mission statement, Little Flash. It's an important document.
