translation.en: We just let them fall asleep wherever they drop.
translation.zh: 他们倒下就睡

translation.en: "Sleep where they drop." Well, I think that should just about do it.
translation.zh: 好吧 “倒下就睡” 嗯 也许行吧

translation.en: What's the bottom line?
translation.zh: 有什么要点吗？

translation.en: Well, you need to correct the deficiencies on this form.
translation.zh:
你们必须把表格上所说的
不合格的地方进行整改

translation.en: And also...
translation.zh: 好 还要

translation.en: you need to fill out these compliance certification documents.
translation.zh: 填这些合规证书档

translation.en: Who wants these, the carrot or the broccoli?
translation.zh: 谁来填 胡萝卜还是西兰花？

translation.en: Carrot.
translation.zh: 胡萝卜

translation.en: There's a lot of stuff on here.
translation.zh: 有很多要填的

translation.en: So we can stay open, right?
translation.zh: 我们不用停业 是吗？

translation.en: As long you've done that by 9:00 a.m. tomorrow morning.
translation.zh: 只要你们明早九点前整改好
九点？

translation.en: Good luck with this. I like what you're doing.
translation.zh: 祝你们好运 你们干得不坏

translation.en: I'd hate to be the guy to shut you down.
translation.zh: 我可不想亲手让你们关门

translation.en: We'd hate for you to be that guy.
translation.zh: 我们也不希望

translation.en: I will be. Don't want to be.
translation.zh: 虽然不愿意 该出手还是要出手的

translation.en: Okay. Safety gates at the bottom of the stairs...
translation.zh: 好了 楼梯末端的安全栅栏

translation.en: top of the stairs, bedrooms, bathrooms.
translation.zh: 楼梯顶端 卧室 浴室

translation.en: I've gone safety gate crazy.
translation.zh: 我都得安全栅栏恐惧症了

translation.en: How many kids have we got?
translation.zh: 我们一共几个孩子？

translation.en: I've lost track, they run so fast.
translation.zh: 记不清 他们跑得太快了

translation.en: You can get started on this batch over here.
translation.zh: 可从那边一堆开始

translation.en: -It's getting late. Let's just call it a night. -We can't call it a night.
translation.zh: 太晚了 结束吧 不行

translation.en: We got a bunch of kids coming in five hours.
translation.zh: 五个小时后 孩子们就要上学了

translation.en: I'm serious. We know nothing about running a day care center.
translation.zh:
我是认真的
我们对办托儿所一无所知

translation.en: We don't know anything. We're not even good parents!
translation.zh: 我们什么都不懂！甚至不是好家长！

translation.en: I'm a good parent.
translation.zh: 我是个好家长

translation.en: -What does that mean? -What?
translation.zh:
-什么意思？
-什么？

translation.en: That thing. What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: You know that rocket ship thing you do? Ben doesn't even like that.
translation.zh:
-还记得你玩的那个火箭船？
-记得 本根本就不喜欢

translation.en: That just happens to be Ben's favorite thing.
translation.zh: 你根本不了解情况 因为那是本最喜欢的

translation.en: He lets you do it because you like it. It's the one time you pay him attention.
translation.zh: 他是因为你喜欢玩才玩的 只有如此你才会注意到他

translation.en: -You don't change your kid's diapers. -I don't like diapers.
translation.zh: 你连给自己孩子换尿布都不会 我不喜欢尿布

translation.en: You should teach your kid how to go to the toilet and aim...
translation.zh:
你该教你的孩子自己上厕所
要瞄准了

translation.en: so we don't have to redecorate the place when he goes.
translation.zh: 那样他走了以后 我才不要重新装潢

translation.en: You're right.
translation.zh: 你说得对

translation.en: Let me tell you something.
translation.zh: 听我说

translation.en: My kid is 4 years old, and for the first time today...
translation.zh:
我儿子四岁了 我今天第一次
看见他像个正常孩子一样

translation.en: I saw him playing with the other kids, just being a normal kid.
translation.zh:
我儿子四岁了 我今天第一次
看见他像个正常孩子一样 和别的孩子玩得很高兴

translation.en: It felt great knowing I had something to do with it.
translation.zh: 这里有我的一些功劳 我觉得很高兴

translation.en: We did that!
translation.zh: 我们办到的！

translation.en: If we can do that, we can definitely get this place up to code by dawn.
translation.zh: 如果我们连那都能办到 明天早晨这里一定也会符合标准

translation.en: Let's go safety gate crazy.
translation.zh: 我们再去弄安全栅栏

translation.en: Don't worry, he'll be fine.
translation.zh: 别担心 他会好的

translation.en: It's all right.
translation.zh: 没事的

translation.en: -All I got is $5. -I can break that.
translation.zh: 我只有五美元的票子 我可以找零

translation.en: Listen, I left the paperwork on the kitchen table. It's not there.
translation.zh: 听着 我把档留在厨房桌上了 但现在没有了 请告诉我你在你手上

translation.en: Please tell me you have it.
translation.zh: 但现在没有了 请告诉我你在你手上

translation.en: I don't have it.
translation.zh: 我没有

translation.en: -Hey, guys. -Marvin, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 嘿 孩子们 马文 你在这里干吗？

translation.en: The door was unlocked. I got your final paychecks here.
translation.zh: 门没锁 我给你送遣散费支票

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: So, what's going on here?
translation.zh: 这边怎么了？

translation.en: Don't even ask.
translation.zh: 别问了 嗨

translation.en: You can understand him?
translation.zh: 你能听懂他说的话？

translation.en: Yeah, he's speaking Klingon.
translation.zh: 对 他说的是克林贡语

translation.en: That's Klingon. I thought the kid was an idiot.
translation.zh:
是克林贡语啊
我还以为这孩子是个傻子

translation.en: God, how much Star Trek does that kid watch?
translation.zh:
老天 这孩子看了多少
《星际迷航》？

translation.en: -Too much. -The guy from Child Services is here.
translation.zh: 看太多了 查理 儿童服务中心的人来了

translation.en: -Sorry. -No, listen. Why don't you do me a favor?
translation.zh:
-天啊
-抱歉 不 听着 你干嘛不帮我个忙？

translation.en: Why don't you take the kids in the back and play with them?
translation.zh:
你为什么不带孩子
到后面跟他们玩？

translation.en: Keep their attention for a while, while I talk to this guy.
translation.zh:
在我和这人讲话的时候
吸引他们的注意力一段时间

translation.en: Whatever you do, don't let this big bruiser get near the lawnmower. Thanks.
translation.zh:
不管你怎么做 别让那个大块头
靠近剪草机 谢谢 马文

translation.en: -Mr. Kubitz. Hi. -I thought I was early, but--
translation.zh: 库伯兹先生 你好 我以为我来早了 但是…

translation.en: -I was just getting the paperwork. -Great.
translation.zh: 我刚拿到文件 很好

translation.en: -You dropped something. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
-掉了
-对

translation.en: -The kids wanted to help out. -That's sweet.
translation.zh: 这些孩子想帮忙 真好

translation.en: So here's everything for you.
translation.zh: 这边是要给你的所有东西

translation.en: What I'll need is your signature on the back of her head.
translation.zh: 我需要你在她的头后面签名

translation.en: And on the elbow of this kid.
translation.zh: 还有在孩子的肘上

translation.en: -Do you have a pen? -I do have a pen.
translation.zh: 你有笔吗？ 我有笔

translation.en: -This is my lucky pen. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 这是我的幸运笔 谢谢

translation.en: -And where's on the-- -Initial the elbow.
translation.zh: 在哪… 肘刚开始的地方

translation.en: -Sign the back of her head. -On her neck?
translation.zh:
好的 签在她头后面 -在她脖子上？
-是的

translation.en: -Great. That should just about do it. -Here we go.
translation.zh: 很好 差不多了 给你

translation.en: -You're ready to roll. -Let's go in and get started.
translation.zh: 你准备好了 让我们进去开始吧

translation.en: Well, you know, everything looks okay here...
translation.zh: 你知道 看起来什么都好了

translation.en: but it says here that you now have 11 children.
translation.zh: 但是这里说你现在有11个孩子

translation.en: That's correct.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: So I assume that you've hired a third care provider.
translation.zh:
是的 所以我假设你雇了
第三个看护人员

translation.en: Why would you just assume that?
translation.zh: 你为什么要这么假设？

translation.en: Well, section 768 of the Child Welfare Code specifically states...
translation.zh: 儿童福利法案第768条明确指出

translation.en: that the ratio of children to care providers cannot exceed 5:1.
translation.zh:
儿童和看护人员的比例
不能超过5比1

translation.en: The ratio thingy. We resolved that this morning.
translation.zh: 比例 比例的事 我们上午解决了 我们上午解决了

translation.en: -Good. -Yes.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: We hired someone. We hired Marvin.
translation.zh:
-是的 我们雇了个人 马文
-我们雇了个人 -我们雇了马文
-马文

translation.en: -Marvin was hired! He's with the kids. -He's an excellent child-care worker.
translation.zh:
对 马文被雇佣了！ -他是一个很棒的儿童看护者
-他和孩子在一起

translation.en: I'd love to take a look, if that's okay with you.
translation.zh: 我想看看 如果你不介意的话

translation.en: -You want to go out there? -It'll be good for me to see for myself.
translation.zh: 你要进去？ 我最好自己看看

translation.en: Let's go and have a look at Marvin.
translation.zh: 我最好自己看看 让我们去看看马文

translation.en: Now, put your hands up. Now, wave them.
translation.zh: 现在举起你的手 晃动

translation.en: He certainly seems like he knows what he's doing.
translation.zh: 他好像知道他在做什么

translation.en: Of course.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: -I've got to say that. -Yeah, we interviewed a lot of people.
translation.zh: 我必须这么说 对 我们面试了很多人

translation.en: Yeah, it was a really long, grueling singling-out process.
translation.zh: 对 真的是一个漫长而艰难的过程

translation.en: And now, I'm a chicken.
translation.zh: 现在我是一只小鸡

translation.en: I'm a bird. Look, I'm a bird.
translation.zh: 我是一只鸟 看 我是一只鸟

translation.en: You can never be too careful when it comes to kids.
translation.zh: 关于小孩的事一定要非常认真

translation.en: And here at Daddy Day Care we'll only work with the best, so we got Marvin.
translation.zh: 在奶爸托儿所我们只和最好的人共事 所以我们请了马文

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: -What did you do to these kids? -What?
translation.zh: 你对这些孩子做了什么？ 啥？

translation.en: -Are they on drugs? -Well, there's this one kid, maybe.
translation.zh: 他们吃药了？ 这个孩子也许吃了

translation.en: How'd you get them to behave like this?
translation.zh: 你怎么让他们如此举止？

translation.en: -Got to know how to handle them. -How do you know that?
translation.zh:
知道怎么控制他们 -你怎么知道的？
-是啊

translation.en: I read Dr. Spock's Baby and Child Care book.
translation.zh:
我读了斯伯克博士有关
婴儿及儿童看护的书

translation.en: It's not about Star Trek.
translation.zh: 和《星际迷航》无关

translation.en: -Finish. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 结束 对

translation.en: You know, when I was in the back...
translation.zh: 你知道 我在后面

translation.en: I spotted, under the eaves of the porch...
translation.zh: 我发现走廊的屋檐下

translation.en: what looked like a beehive.
translation.zh: 好像有个峰巢 挺大一个

translation.en: -A big one. -Don't worry. All taken care of.
translation.zh: 好像有个峰巢 挺大一个 别担心 都会没事的

translation.en: -I don't want anybody getting hurt. -No hurt. Gone.
translation.zh: 我不想有人受伤 没有受伤 走

translation.en: -You really have turned this around. -Thank you very much.
translation.zh:
你们这次真正转变了
你们应该为此感到骄傲

translation.en: -I'm impressed. I really am. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 令我印象深刻 真的

translation.en: For our own curiosity...
translation.zh: 谢谢 为了满足我的好奇心

translation.en: any chance you could tell us where the complaint came from?
translation.zh: 你能不能告诉 我们投诉是哪来的？

translation.en: I really would love to, but I have a relationship with the state.
translation.zh: 我真的很想说 但是我和州里有保密协议

translation.en: -Just for our own curiosity. -That was Miss Harridan.
translation.zh: 只是为了满足我们的好奇心 是何瑞顿小姐

translation.en: -I'm sure she'll see us. -We need to talk to you.
translation.zh: 我肯定她会见我们 我们需要和你谈谈

translation.en: -Sorry. They just barged right in. -That's quite all right, Jenny.
translation.zh: 抱歉 他们刚刚闯入 没事 詹妮

translation.en: Gentlemen, please sit down.
translation.zh: 先生们请坐

translation.en: Now, what can I do for you?
translation.zh: 我能为你们做什么？

translation.en: We wanted to thank you for helping to expedite our accreditation process.
translation.zh: 我想谢谢你帮助我们 更快地完成了认证过程

translation.en: Thanks to your tip, somebody from child services came to see us.
translation.zh:
谢谢你的提示
儿童服务中心的人来找我们

translation.en: I had heard you opened some sort of day care program...
translation.zh: 我听说你们开办了某种保育程序

translation.en: and I was concerned.
translation.zh: 我很关心

translation.en: That's nice of you. You don't have to be concerned about us.
translation.zh: 你真好 你不必一定要关心我们

translation.en: It's not you I'm concerned about. It's the children you're looking after.
translation.zh: 我不是在关心你 我关心的是你照顾的孩子

translation.en: -Wait a minute. We're parents. That's a start. -Any boob can be a parent.
translation.zh:
等一下 我们是父母
那就是一个开始 任何笨蛋都可以成为父母

translation.en: If you want to screw up your own child, that's your right.
translation.zh:
如果你想教坏你自己的孩子
那是你的权利

translation.en: But when it comes to other people's kids, there's a higher standard to answer to.
translation.zh: 但是如果是别人的孩子 就要有高标准

translation.en: Mr. Kubitz seems to think that we met that standard. Show her the thing.
translation.zh:
库伯兹先生看起来
认为我们达到了标准 让她看看

translation.en: That piece of paper doesn't impress me.
translation.zh: 我才不鸟这张纸

translation.en: We're getting it laminated.
translation.zh: 我们通过检查了

translation.en: You two are just some fly-by-night operation looking to make a fast buck.
translation.zh:
你们两个只是想要
赚点外快的两个骗子

translation.en: You're just afraid of the competition. Let's go.
translation.zh: 你只是害怕竞争 我们走

translation.en: Competition? Don't flatter yourselves.
translation.zh: 我们走 竞争？别夸自己了

translation.en: Daddy Day Care will never be in the same league as this institution.
translation.zh:
奶爸托儿所永远也不会
成为这个协会的会员

translation.en: Laminated!
translation.zh: 通过了！

translation.en: That wasn't as satisfying as I thought.
translation.zh: 我不像我想象中的那样满足

translation.en: I think we can take her. All we need is some garlic and a wooden stake.
translation.zh: 我想我们可以搞定她 我们只需要一些大蒜和树桩

translation.en: You know what she said that was right?
translation.zh: 你知道她说的什么是正确的吗？

translation.en: These kids need more than watching. Tomorrow we'll take it up a notch.
translation.zh: 孩子需要的不只是看护 我们明天要提高一个档次

translation.en: We got to start stimulating their minds.
translation.zh: 我们要开始激发他们的思想

translation.en: -But I'm not a daddy. -You don't have to be a daddy.
translation.zh: 但是我不是一个父亲 你不必成为一个父亲

translation.en: You're a male-type humanoid. That fits in with the philosophy of the place.
translation.zh: 你有雄性特征 这符合这地方的哲学

translation.en: I don't know, guys. I mean, I guess I like hanging out with the kids.
translation.zh:
我不知道 我是说
我想我喜欢和孩子混在一起

translation.en: It's kind of cool.
translation.zh: 有点酷

translation.en: But I guess child-care wasn't necessarily...
translation.zh: 但我认为看护孩子并不是

translation.en: an avenue that I felt professionally I was headed towards.
translation.zh: 但我认为看护孩子并不是 我职业生涯取得成功的必由之路

translation.en: -That's exactly what I said. -Excuse me.
translation.zh: 正如我说的

translation.en: Yes, come on in!
translation.zh: 请原谅 嗯 进来！

translation.en: -How are you? -Hey, guys.
translation.zh: 你好吗？ 嘿 各位

translation.en: I am so sorry. I forgot to write you a check this week.
translation.zh: 我真抱歉 这周我忘了给你开支票

translation.en: Ever since the divorce, my head's just been like....
translation.zh: 自从离婚以来 我的头一直像

translation.en: -Are you the new daddy? -I'm your daddy.
translation.zh: 嗨 你是新的奶爸？ 我是你爸

translation.en: I'm not your daddy.
translation.zh: 我不是你爸

translation.en: Well, I'm your baby's daddy. I'm not....
translation.zh: 我是你孩子的父亲 我不是

translation.en: I'm not your baby's daddy. I'm going to be....
translation.zh: 我不是你孩子的父亲 我将要成为

translation.en: You're Marvin.
translation.zh: 你是马文

translation.en: Well, it's nice to meet you, Marvin. I'm Kelli.
translation.zh: 见到你很高兴 马文 我是克丽

translation.en: Dylan's mom.
translation.zh: 德兰的妈妈

translation.en: -I got to run. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 我得走了 谢谢

translation.en: -All right. Bye, guys. -Have a good one.
translation.zh: 好吧 再见 祝一切顺利

translation.en: -Thanks. -Bye.
translation.zh: 谢谢 再见

translation.en: I'm in. Do you have a dental plan?
translation.zh: 我加入了 你们给牙病补贴吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧 马文

translation.en: Your first assignment is to show us how you handle kids the way you do.
translation.zh:
你的第一个任务就是
让我们看看你怎样控制孩子的

translation.en: Teach us.
translation.zh: 教我们

translation.en: If this were a business, and they were customers...
translation.zh: 如果这是生意 他们是客户

translation.en: how do you find out what they want?
translation.zh: 你怎么找出他们想要的？

translation.en: -I'd put together a focus group. -All right, let's do it.
translation.zh: 我会组织一个讨论小组 好 我们来做

translation.en: We'd like you to tell us what you'd like to get out of Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh:
我们要你告诉我们
你想从奶爸托儿所得到什么

translation.en: Help us to help you.
translation.zh: 帮助我们来帮助你们

translation.en: Who'd like to start?
translation.zh: 谁想先开始？

translation.en: We need more learning about things.
translation.zh: 我们需要更多的学习

translation.en: -More learning about things? -Yes.
translation.zh: 更多的学习？ 对

translation.en: We're at a very critical age.
translation.zh: 我们正处于关键的年龄

translation.en: -You have to feed our minds. -All right. You want to write that down?
translation.zh: 你们必须教我们点什么 好吧 你要写下来么 马文？

translation.en: "Feed our minds."
translation.zh: “教我们点什么”

translation.en: Great. Okay, what else?
translation.zh: 很好 还有什么？

translation.en: Dolphins. Dolphins are good.
translation.zh: 海豚 海豚很好

translation.en: -Dolphins are fish. -No, they're not.
translation.zh: 海豚是鱼 不 不是

translation.en: -They live in water. -That doesn't mean they're fish.
translation.zh: 不 不是 那不意味着它们是鱼

translation.en: Calm down and talk about something else. What else would you like to talk about?
translation.zh: 冷静下来说点别的 你还想说点什么别的？

translation.en: Where do babies come from?
translation.zh: 婴儿从哪里来？

translation.en: Let's go back to the dolphin subject and discuss dolphins...
translation.zh:
我们为什么不回到海豚话题
讨论海豚

translation.en: or if there's anything else on someone's mind we can talk about...
translation.zh: 或者说点你们其他想的事情

translation.en: -other than that. -Write that down.
translation.zh: 除了那个之外 写下来

translation.en: -Okay, what else? -Could we....
translation.zh: 好吧 还有什么？ 我们能否…

translation.en: What were you going to say, Ben?
translation.zh: 你想说什么 本？

translation.en: I can see you were going to say something. What is it, son?
translation.zh: 我可以看出你要说点什么 是什么 孩子？

translation.en: More...
translation.zh: 更多…

translation.en: -drawing? -More drawings?
translation.zh: 画？ 更多画？

translation.en: Yeah! Like pictures and stuff. It's really fun.
translation.zh: 对！就像图片什么的 真的很有趣

translation.en: -Okay, yeah, great. More drawings. -Yeah!
translation.zh: 好 对 很棒 更多的画 对！

translation.en: -More chasing bad guys. -Excellent idea.
translation.zh: 更多的追坏人的游戏 很棒的主意

translation.en: We can chase Joker.
translation.zh: 我们可以追“小丑”

translation.en: Well, wait a second, buddy. That's Batman's bad guy.
translation.zh:
等一下 老兄
那是蝙蝠侠里面的角色

translation.en: You're Flash, so you want to be chasing--
translation.zh: 你是闪电侠 所以你想追…

translation.en: -Lex Luthor? -No. That's Superman.
translation.zh: 莱克斯卢瑟尔？ 不 那是超人里面的

translation.en: You want to be chasing Captain Boomerang, Gorilla Grodd, Reverse Flash.
translation.zh:
你想要追赶回力标船长
葛洛德大猩猩 反转闪电

translation.en: The Riddler?
translation.zh: 谜妖？

translation.en: What have you been doing to these kids?
translation.zh: 你对这些孩子做了什么？

translation.en: Starting tomorrow, Phil will be hosting a Three Stooges film festival in the TV room.
translation.zh: 从明天开始 费尔将在电视房 主持一个三人电影节

translation.en: I know everybody's looking forward to that, right?
translation.zh: 我知道每个人都很期待 对吧？

translation.en: Thanks, Daddy!
translation.zh: 谢谢 奶爸！

translation.en: Last but not least, the Thumb Suckers Support Group will have a meeting...
translation.zh:
最后一件事 “吮手指”和“支持小组”
将在小睡时间之后

translation.en: under the tree after nap time...
translation.zh: 在树下举行会议

translation.en: which starts right after you finish your snack.
translation.zh: 吃完点心之后就睡觉

translation.en: So after you finish, grab a blanket, get a spot, and we have that.
translation.zh: 等你吃完了 抢个毯子 找个位置

translation.en: Also, next week is going to be Alpha Girls Group.
translation.zh: 还有 下周将轮到阿尔法女孩组

translation.en: And we're going to have Tai Chi under the tree.
translation.zh: 我们还要在树下练太极

translation.en: And we're going to also have pet day, so you bring your pets in.
translation.zh:
我们还将举办宠物日
可以带你们的宠物来

translation.en: We'll have pet show-and-tell.
translation.zh: 我们将介绍和展示自己的宠物

translation.en: This is my bunny. His name is Tiny.
translation.zh: 这是我的小兔 他的名字叫泰尼

translation.en: I feed him a lot. Five times a day.
translation.zh: 我喂他很多吃的 一天五次

translation.en: He poops a lot, too. Six times a day.
translation.zh: 他也拉得很多 一天六次

translation.en: It's like little marbles.
translation.zh: 就像小弹珠

translation.en: This is my turtle, Sparks.
translation.zh: 这是我的海龟 斯帕克斯

translation.en: He's fast. He's the fastest turtle in the world.
translation.zh: 他很快 他是世界上最快的海龟

translation.en: Go! Go, Sparks!
translation.zh: 上！上 斯帕克斯！

translation.en: This is my parrot, Paulie. I'm teaching him to talk. Talk.
translation.zh:
这是我的鹦鹉玻利
我教他说话 说话

translation.en: Shut up, butthead.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 笨蛋

translation.en: Okay, Becca, where's your pet?
translation.zh: 好吧 贝可 你的宠物呢？

translation.en: I had a tarantula, but I don't know where he is.
translation.zh: 我有一只狼蛛 但是我不知道他在哪

translation.en: Okay, all right, don't panic.
translation.zh: 好 别紧张

translation.en: What do you mean, don't panic? There's a big spider in here.
translation.zh:
你什么意思 别紧张？
这里有一只大蜘蛛

translation.en: I got a spider on my head!
translation.zh: 我头上有一蜘蛛！

translation.en: -So what are we betting on today? -I'm going to do a diaper stroke, okay?
translation.zh: 我们今天打什么赌？ 堵我会打出一个“尿布球” 好吗？

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: Well, if it isn't the geniuses that brought the world Veggie-Os.
translation.zh:
这不是给世界带来
蔬菜粒麦片的天才们吗？

translation.en: -So, how's unemployment? -Actually, I've got the best job I've ever had.
translation.zh: 失业怎么样？ 事实上 我得到了最好的工作

translation.en: Yeah, it's a start-up.
translation.zh: 对 是一个开始

translation.en: We offer time-management facilitation to mostly working professionals.
translation.zh: 我们为大多数职员 提供时间管理方面的帮助

translation.en: That's a tough market. Sounds pretty cutthroat.
translation.zh:
那是一个艰难的市场
听起来非常残酷

translation.en: -Yeah. It's a real blood sport. -What's the money like?
translation.zh: 对 真的是一个血腥的领域 钱长什么样？

translation.en: Bruce! Let's go, I got Botox.
translation.zh: 布鲁斯！我们走 我接到了博托

translation.en: Hi, Charlie. Hi, Phil.
translation.zh: 你好 查理 你好 费尔

translation.en: -Hey, Crispin. -What's up, little man?
translation.zh: 嘿 奎斯品 怎么样 孩子？

translation.en: How do you know my kid?
translation.zh: 你们怎么认识我的孩子？

translation.en: They're his day care teachers, what do you think?
translation.zh: 他们是他的保育老师 你以为是啥？

translation.en: Day care? That's what it is?
translation.zh: 保育？是啥？

translation.en: Oh, my God. You're wiping boogers for a living.
translation.zh:
哦 上帝 你们靠帮孩子
挖鼻屎混饭吃

translation.en: Losers.
translation.zh: 失败者

translation.en: You're paying us to do it, too, you know.
translation.zh: 你也在付钱让我们干这个 你知道的

translation.en: Losers.
translation.zh: 失败者

translation.en: "Do you like green eggs and ham?
translation.zh: “你喜欢新鲜的蛋和火腿么？”

translation.en: "I do not like them, Sam-I-Am. I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.zh:
是的 “我不喜欢那些
我不喜欢新鲜的蛋和火腿”

translation.en: "Would you like to eat them here or there?
translation.zh: “你要在这里还是那里吃？”

translation.en: "I would not like to eat them anywhere. I do not like green eggs and ham.
translation.zh: 是的 “我不会在任何地方吃这些 我不喜欢这些

translation.en: "I do not like them, Sam-I-Am." Okay?
translation.zh: 我不喜欢这些”这样说行吗？

translation.en: Now see, he was going to punch Sam-I-Am, but he walked away.
translation.zh: 看 他刚要揍这个

translation.en: You don't punch, see? He walked away with it.
translation.zh:
但是他走开了 他没有揍他
看到了？他带着东西走开了

translation.en: Where's Mommy?
translation.zh: 妈咪在哪？

translation.en: Mommy had to work today.
translation.zh: 她今天要上班

translation.en: Remember when you used to work all the times?
translation.zh: 记得你以前也是这么一直工作的？

translation.en: Yeah, back when I had a real job.
translation.zh: 是的 那个时候我有一个真正的工作

translation.en: Do you miss work?
translation.zh: 你想念工作的时光了？

translation.en: I guess. I suppose so. I miss it.
translation.zh: 我觉得 我是 我想念

translation.en: But don't get me wrong. It's not like I don't like hanging out with you guys.
translation.zh: 别误解我的意思 不是因为我不喜欢跟你们在一起玩

translation.en: It's just that Daddy used to be a big shot down at work.
translation.zh: 只是我之前在工作上 起着非常重要的作用

translation.en: I had my own office and a big, pretty view. Remember that big, pretty view Daddy had?
translation.zh: 我有我自己的办公室 那边风景不错 记得以前爸办公室的漂亮风景吗？

translation.en: I like it when you spin me around in that cool chair.
translation.zh:
我很喜欢坐在那个很棒的大转椅上
你转着我看风景

translation.en: Yeah, that's a cool chair.
translation.zh: 是的 很棒的椅子

translation.en: A lot of cool things about that job. Cool chair...
translation.zh: 关于那个工作的很多很棒的东西 很棒的椅子

translation.en: I had people working underneath me...
translation.zh: 我有些帮我做事的人

translation.en: and, just between you and I, the pay wasn't that bad either.
translation.zh: 还有就是 对我们来说 待遇也不算坏

translation.en: -Put that down. What do you think of that? -What is it?
translation.zh: 放下那个 你觉得那个怎么样？ 这是什么？

translation.en: What do you mean? It's a dog in the sunshine.
translation.zh: 你什么意思？是太阳下的狗

translation.en: -It doesn't look like one. -That's because it's abstract.
translation.zh: 看起来不像 那是因为他是抽象的

translation.en: You have to squint when you look at it.
translation.zh: 当你看着他的时候 你需要斜视

translation.en: And when you see it like this, that's abstract.
translation.zh: 当你这么看的时候 那就是抽象的

translation.en: Yeah? You see it?
translation.zh: 是这样 你看到了？

translation.en: How about if you tilt your head to the side?
translation.zh: 你斜一下你的头从旁边看怎么样？

translation.en: -No, the other way. -Still doesn't look like one.
translation.zh: 不 另一个方向 还是看不出来

translation.en: Okay, well, what are you over there working on, Michelangelo?
translation.zh: 好吧 你在那做什么？米开朗基罗？ 你画了什么？

translation.en: What is that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: There's nothing abstract about that now, is it?
translation.zh: 那不是抽象的 对吗？

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: That's pretty good.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: You got Daddy's head looking kind of round, though.
translation.zh: 虽然你让老爸有那样的圆脑袋

translation.en: Is my head that round?
translation.zh: 我的头真的那么圆？

translation.en: -No. But I got your mustache. -Yeah, I see. A nice green mustache.
translation.zh:
不 但我画了你的胡须 是的 我看到了
新长出来的

translation.en: That's all right, son.
translation.zh: 孩子 没事

translation.en: I just paid the mortgage, the car loan and the electric bill.
translation.zh: 我刚刚已经付清了抵押借款 车子贷款和电费

translation.en: Look at the balance in the checking account.
translation.zh: 看看账户上的余额

translation.en: -74 cents. -Yeah. That's right, 74 cents.
translation.zh: 74分 是啊 没错 74分

translation.en: -You are my Superman. -You got that right.
translation.zh: 你真的好强 你说对了

translation.en: I've worked hard, and I think it's time to let off a little of my frustration.
translation.zh: 我曾经工作非常努力 我想现在是时候摆脱不开心的事情了

translation.en: It's time for you to take care of your Superman.
translation.zh: 是时候你要照顾我了

translation.en: -My Superman. Come here, baby. -That's right.
translation.zh: 我的 超人 过来 宝贝 是的

translation.en: No! The monster's going to get me!
translation.zh: 不！魔鬼快抓着我了！

translation.en: It's probably a nightmare.
translation.zh: 这或许是个噩梦

translation.en: -Be right back. -Okay, hurry up. Mommy's coming!
translation.zh: 我一会回来 好的 快点 妈妈去看你了！

translation.en: No, I want Daddy.
translation.zh: 不 我要爸爸

translation.en: -Did everything go okay? -Yeah, everything's just fine.
translation.zh: 一切都还好吧？ 是的 都还不错

translation.en: What's that face for?
translation.zh: 你为啥那表情？

translation.en: Since when does he like you better than he likes me?
translation.zh: 他什么时候喜欢你胜过我了？

translation.en: No, don't even trip. It's not like that.
translation.zh: 不 别说远了 不是你说的那样

translation.en: I've just been spending more time with him, so he wanted me.
translation.zh: 我只是和他待的时间比较长 所以他要我

translation.en: He's getting much more confident.
translation.zh: 他在慢慢地恢复信心

translation.en: Remember how he wouldn't play with anyone else at first?
translation.zh:
记得他一开始
都不愿意跟任何人玩么？

translation.en: Now, he's even playing with that kid, Crispin.
translation.zh: 现在 他甚至和那孩子玩 奎斯品

translation.en: Crispin happened to say "thank you" at lunch today without being told.
translation.zh:
奎斯品突然在午餐的时候
说了一句“谢谢” 没人跟他说要那么说

translation.en: And that little girl Becca, she can read. She's just a baby.
translation.zh:
还有那个小女孩 贝可
她现在已经能读东西了 她只是一个小孩子

translation.en: I seen her pick up a Curious George book, sit down and read like a grownup.
translation.zh: 我看到她找了一本古怪乔治的书 坐在那里像一个成人一样地看

translation.en: What's that face?
translation.zh: 那是什么表情？

translation.en: I haven't seen you this excited about something in a long time.
translation.zh: 我已经很长一段时间没看到你 对什么事物这么兴奋了

translation.en: Yeah, I ain't going to front.
translation.zh: 是的 我不会否认这一点

translation.en: Them little crumb snatchers got under my skin.
translation.zh: 让这些小孩子有个安身的地方

translation.en: Mrs. Plager, I cannot continue to expose the other children...
translation.zh:
布拉奇太太
我不能继续再让别的孩子

translation.en: to such dangerous, self-destructive, highly addictive behavior.
translation.zh: 接触到这么危险的 具有自身破坏性 的高度上瘾行为

translation.en: So either Juliette stops the thumb sucking...
translation.zh: 所以 要不朱丽叶不再吸拇指…

translation.en: or you'll just have to find yourself another preschool.
translation.zh: 要不你将自己去找另一所托儿所

translation.en: Are you busy?
translation.zh: 你很忙？

translation.en: Just pruning a few weeds from the garden. What is it?
translation.zh: 只是在园子除掉一下野草 怎么了？

translation.en: Okay, I just thought you should know...
translation.zh: 好吧 我以为你应该知道

translation.en: we've lost three more students.
translation.zh: 我们又失去了三个孩子

translation.en: Are you seriously suggesting you don't know where they are?
translation.zh: 你在暗示我你不知道他们在哪？

translation.en: No, ma'am.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: -I know where they are. -So do I.
translation.zh: 我知道他们在哪 我也是

translation.en: Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: 奶爸安亲班

translation.en: First, it was amusing.
translation.zh: 首先 它很有趣

translation.en: Then it was annoying.
translation.zh: 第二 它很讨厌

translation.en: Now it's really starting to tick me off.
translation.zh: 现在它开始惹火我了

translation.en: Get me a copy of Child Day Care Services Regulations.
translation.zh: 给我一份托儿所服务规章

translation.en: Phil, get the door.
translation.zh: 费尔 开门

translation.en: Get the door!
translation.zh: 开门！

translation.en: All right, I got it.
translation.zh: 好的 知道了

translation.en: Mr. Kubitz. What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 库比兹先生 你在这里干什么？

translation.en: -Is this a bad time? -No, it's a great time.
translation.zh: 现在不适合在这？ 不 怎么会呢？

translation.en: Is the man of the house at home?
translation.zh: 主人在家吗？

translation.en: "Man of the house."
translation.zh: “主人？”

translation.en: Charlie! Mr. Kubitz is here from Child Services!
translation.zh: 查理！ 儿童部的库比兹先生来了！

translation.en: I'll be right there.
translation.zh: 我就在那边

translation.en: So, let me ask you. Where are the kids?
translation.zh: 现在 让我问问你 那些孩子在哪？

translation.en: Outside. Marvin's giving them a puppet show.
translation.zh: 在外面 马文在给他们做木偶秀

translation.en: Nice. What's on the program? Pinocchio? Little Red Riding Hood?
translation.zh: 好的 什么节目？ 皮诺曹？还是小红马？

translation.en: No, Wrath of Khan.
translation.zh: 都不是 是“可汗的愤怒”

translation.en: -Mr. Kubitz. Hi! -Hi.
translation.zh: 你好 库比兹先生

translation.en: -Wait! What are you doing? -What?
translation.zh: 你好 等一下！你在干什么？ 什么？

translation.en: -What's wrong with your face? -My face?
translation.zh:
-你的脸怎么了？
-我的脸？

translation.en: What's all that stuff, man? Come on. What's the matter with you?
translation.zh: 那些颜料是怎么回事？ 你怎么了？

translation.en: Becca and Jamie.
translation.zh: 是贝可和杰米

translation.en: If you'll excuse me, I have to see two little girls...
translation.zh: 如果你允许的话 我想见见这两个小女孩

translation.en: because now I'm a big girl.
translation.zh: 因为我现在是个大女孩

translation.en: He's having fun with.... Mr. Kubitz, so what brings you here today?
translation.zh: 他在…玩呢 库比兹先生 什么风把您给吹来了？

translation.en: -I've received another complaint-- -I guess we know who that came from.
translation.zh: 我收到了另外一个投诉 我猜我们知道是谁

translation.en: I understand that you've acquired three more children since my last visit.
translation.zh: 我知道你这里从上次我来过之后 又多了三个孩子

translation.en: Yes. We're 14 altogether now.
translation.zh: 是的 我们现在有14个孩子

translation.en: It's still three adults, so we're still under the 5:1 ratio.
translation.zh:
还有三个大人 所以我们还是按照
5比1的比率原则

translation.en: Right. But you see, it's a totally different issue this time.
translation.zh: 嗯 但你看 查理 现在是一个完全不同的情况

translation.en: Charlie, can I talk to you for a second?
translation.zh: 查理 我能和你说一会话么？

translation.en: Mr. Kubitz, excuse me a second. I'm going to go handle this.
translation.zh: 等一下 对不起 我要去处理一下

translation.en: -Have a cookie. -Sure. Thanks.
translation.zh:
-吃个小甜饼吧
-好的 谢谢

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 发生什么了？

translation.en: -What's up? -Flash is gone.
translation.zh:
-什么事？
-闪电侠不见了

translation.en: -What do you mean, gone? Gone where? -I can't find him.
translation.zh:
你是什么意思？不见了？
在哪不见了？ 我找不到他了

translation.en: -You looked everywhere? In the garage? -Everywhere.
translation.zh: 你所有地方都找遍了？花园呢？ 所有地方

translation.en: What we going to do?
translation.zh: 我们该怎么办？

translation.en: -Is there some kind of problem out here? -Not at all, Mr. Kubitz.
translation.zh: 这里有什么问题么？ 没有 库比兹先生

translation.en: We're just having a little conversation about the--
translation.zh: 我们只是在谈论…

translation.en: -Okay, because if it's-- -No problem at all. Why don't you....
translation.zh: 好的 因为如果这是… 完全没问题 为什么你不…

translation.en: Kids! Why don't you meet our good friend, Mr. Kubitz.
translation.zh:
孩子们！ 去见见我们的好朋友怎么样？
库比兹先生

translation.en: -Say hi. -Hi, Mr. Kubitz.
translation.zh: 打个招呼 嗨 库比兹先生

translation.en: Hi, guys.
translation.zh: 嗨 孩子们

translation.en: Wouldn't it be nice if Mr. Kubitz played with you guys...
translation.zh: 库比兹先生要和你们一起玩 好吗？

translation.en: while we had an important conversation?
translation.zh:
因为我们有个
很重要的事情要讨论一下

translation.en: -Would you be so kind? -Is that a good idea?
translation.zh: 你们会乖的 对吗？ 那不是个好主意吗？

translation.en: We're having a grown-up conversation the kids shouldn't be privy to.
translation.zh: 我们在讨论大人的事情 跟小孩子没什么关系的

translation.en: -So just for a second. Please. -Sure. That's different.
translation.zh: 只是一小会儿 当然 那不一样

translation.en: -I'll check the back yard. -I'll go upstairs.
translation.zh:
-我去检查一下后院
-我去楼上看看

translation.en: I'll check the basement.
translation.zh: 我去地下室

translation.en: Do we have a basement?
translation.zh: 我们有地下室？

translation.en: We have to do the laundry. God!
translation.zh: 我们需要洗衣服！天啊

translation.en: Oh, my God! They vaporized him!
translation.zh: 天啊！他们把他蒸发了！

translation.en: He couldn't have got far. I'll call the police.
translation.zh: 他不可能走远 我去叫警察

translation.en: -I'll call his parents. -If only I were a Betazoid, I could sense him.
translation.zh:
我去通知他的父母 如果我是一个贝塔索星人
我就能感知他在哪里

translation.en: -Which kid is this? -I don't know. What's your name?
translation.zh: 那个孩子是谁？ 我不知道 你叫什么？

translation.en: Tony.
translation.zh: 托尼

translation.en: -Flash's name is Tony. -Actually, Flash's name is Wally West--
translation.zh: 闪电侠的名字是托尼 事实上 闪电侠的名字是威里… 嗨

translation.en: -Why aren't you wearing your Flash suit? -I don't want to be Flash anymore.
translation.zh:
嗨 托尼 你怎么没穿你
的闪电侠的戏服？ 我再也不愿意当闪电侠了

translation.en: -You don't? Who you want to be? -Tony.
translation.zh: 你不要？那你要当谁？ 托尼

translation.en: -Hear that? He wants to be Tony. -He wants to be Tony.
translation.zh: 听到了没？他要当托尼

translation.en: That's nice. You want to be Tony. That's great.
translation.zh:
-他要当托尼
-那很好 你要像托尼一样 那很好

translation.en: Tony, have a cookie. Have a fresh one.
translation.zh: 托尼 吃个小甜饼 新鲜的

translation.en: What are you talking about? I do love you. I'm just not in love with you.
translation.zh: 你在说什么？我真的爱你 我已经不再爱你了

translation.en: Fifteen months of therapy, that's the best you can do?
translation.zh:
15个月的治疗
你就只能做到这样？

translation.en: That is the dumbest line I have ever heard.
translation.zh: 那是我听过最让我无言的话

translation.en: My mother was right about you.
translation.zh: 我妈妈关于你的看法是对的

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: For what? You think this will change? You think I'll change?
translation.zh:
关于什么？你认为这会改变？
你认为我会改变？

translation.en: You think this is what I had in mind?
translation.zh: 你认为这是我心里想的？

translation.en: Being a 55-year-old man, living with his mother?
translation.zh:
作为一个55岁的老男人
和他的母亲住在一起？

translation.en: You think that's my idea of a good time?
translation.zh: 你认为那样我认为的美好生活？

translation.en: I love passive-aggressive losers.
translation.zh: 我喜欢被动反击的失败者

translation.en: According to state regulations, a child-care center in a family home...
translation.zh: 根据州规章 一个家庭的孩子照顾数量…

translation.en: is limited to a maximum of 12 children.
translation.zh: 仅限于最多12个孩子

translation.en: -We have plenty of room here for these kids. -I don't make the rules, I enforce them.
translation.zh:
我不明白 我们有足够的空间
提供给这些孩子 不是我制定的规章 我是被迫执行

translation.en: You can't have more than 12 kids at this kind of location.
translation.zh: 你这个地方 超过12个孩子

translation.en: So if we want to stay in business, we have to fire two kids.
translation.zh: 所过我们还要继续营业的话 我们必须开除两个孩子

translation.en: Unless you want to move to a permanent facility somewhere else, then yes.
translation.zh: 除非搬到到一个别的某个 常规设施里 那么就可以

translation.en: So, who do we cut loose?
translation.zh: 那么 我们要开除谁？

translation.en: How about Becca and Jamie?
translation.zh: 贝可和杰米怎么样？

translation.en: I can't do it.
translation.zh: 我不能这么做

translation.en: We got to do something.
translation.zh: 我们必须做点什么

translation.en: Why don't we get a bigger space?
translation.zh: 为什么我们不找个更大点的地方？

translation.en: "Space. The Final Frontier."
translation.zh: “太空…最后的疆域”

translation.en: I'm serious. Harridan said we're not real. Let's get real.
translation.zh:
马文 我是认真的 何瑞顿说
我们是玩闹 那我们就来真的

translation.en: Let's get a bigger space, more kids, hire more people...
translation.zh:
我们找个大一点的地方 更多的孩子
雇更多的人

translation.en: and give this woman a run for her money.
translation.zh: 让那个女人没钱赚

translation.en: -Great. Let's get a new space. -Yeah, Final Frontier!
translation.zh: 好吧 让我们找个新的地方 好的 最终疆域！

translation.en: If you don't stop with that Star Trek, I'll push you in that sticker bush. Stop!
translation.zh: 如果你不停止玩《星际迷航》的话 我就把你推到货堆里 停下！

translation.en: No! I'm saying that there is a space available called "The Final Frontier."
translation.zh: 不！我说的是一个 叫做“最终疆域”的地方

translation.en: This used to be my home away from home.
translation.zh: 这里以前是我另一个家

translation.en: Jerry, the guy who owned this place, had the ultimate collection of memorabilia.
translation.zh: 杰瑞 这个地方的主人 收集了所有大事记

translation.en: You know what he had? Tricorder.
translation.zh: 你知道他有什么？ 三录仪

translation.en: That Ensign Riley wore in The Doomsday Machine.
translation.zh: 那个世界末日机器上的旗帜

translation.en: Yeah. I never saw that episode.
translation.zh: 是的 我从没见过那样的情节

translation.en: I was with him, not watching also.
translation.zh: 我当时在他身边 不单单在看

translation.en: Needs a lot of work.
translation.zh: 需要很多工作

translation.en: That just means we can fix it up how we want to fix it up.
translation.zh: 那只是说我们能修好它 怎么修

translation.en: But we'll need some money to do that.
translation.zh: 我们需要很多钱

translation.en: To make money, you got to spend money.
translation.zh: 要赚钱 首先你先要花钱

translation.en: To spend money, you got to have money.
translation.zh: 要花钱 你首先要有钱

translation.en: "Rock for Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: “奶爸育儿院音乐节

translation.en: "Help us finance our new permanent home."
translation.zh: 帮我们筹集资金买新房子吧”

translation.en: Do you know what this means?
translation.zh: 你知道这代表什么？

translation.en: It's a chance to improve ourselves through a little healthy competition?
translation.zh: 通过一点健康竞赛 我们都能得到提高？

translation.en: No, you bubbleheaded idiot. It's a death sentence.
translation.zh: 不 你这个蠢货 这是个死亡判决

translation.en: If they get their hands on a big enough space, they'll ruin me.
translation.zh: 如果他们得到了足够大的地方 我就完了

translation.en: They're selling fun. I can't compete with fun.
translation.zh: 他们在出售快乐 我竞争不过他们

translation.en: I should've crushed them in the beginning when they were weak.
translation.zh:
在开始的时候
当他们的实力还不够的时候 我就应该把他们弄垮

translation.en: It'll be harder now, but I have no choice. I've got to stop them.
translation.zh:
现在看来会困难点
但是我没有别的选择 我必须制止他们

translation.en: How are you gonna do that?
translation.zh: 你怎么做？

translation.en: By any means necessary.
translation.zh: 用任何必要的手段

translation.en: Yeah, ride the pony.
translation.zh: 骑那匹小马

translation.en: Pet the goat.
translation.zh: 养羊

translation.en: Get a T-shirt made. Something to eat.
translation.zh: 做一件T恤 一些吃的东西

translation.en: Enjoy the music!
translation.zh: 享受一下音乐！

translation.en: -They're showing Logan's Run, Friday-- -Friday night at 8:00.
translation.zh: 星期五上映《罗根快跑》 星期五晚上八点

translation.en: If you're not busy Friday nights...
translation.zh: 如果你星期五晚上不忙的话…

translation.en: -maybe you'd like to-- -Yeah, sure.
translation.zh: 或许…你想… 当然可以

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: 好极了

translation.en: So we're talking, like, just dinner, bath, bed?
translation.zh:
我们只是谈论
比如晚餐 洗澡 床？

translation.en: -The works? -What?
translation.zh: 工作？ 什么？

translation.en: You want me to baby-sit so you can go to the movie, right?
translation.zh:
你要我乖乖待在家里
你就能去看电影 对吗？

translation.en: Marvin, I want you to go with me.
translation.zh: 马文 我想要你跟我去

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好 好的

translation.en: -Okay. Great. -All right. Here's your thing.
translation.zh: 很好 这是你的东西

translation.en: Thank you very much. Okay. There you go.
translation.zh: 非常感谢 好的 给你

translation.en: I don't think we should do this.
translation.zh: 我认为我们不应该这么做

translation.en: Jennifer, my dear, in life there are winners and there are losers.
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 亲爱的 生活中有胜利者和失败者

translation.en: And if you want to be a winner, sometimes you have to play dirty.
translation.zh: 如果你要做一个胜利者 有时候你需要做点不光彩的事情

translation.en: I'll show you. I'll paint my face first. And then you paint yourself.
translation.zh: 我会弄给你看 我会先画我的脸 然后你画你自己的

translation.en: See? Put a little paint. And I'm just going to....
translation.zh: 看到了？弄一点颜料… 然后…

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: That's not paint! It's glue!
translation.zh: 这不是颜料！这是胶水！

translation.en: Could I have some more of this delicious potato salad?
translation.zh:
我能再吃点这些可口的
马铃薯色拉么？

translation.en: Have you tried it? Really. It is so good.
translation.zh: 很棒的 你尝过了？ 真的 非常棒

translation.en: -What's up? -Look.
translation.zh: 怎么了？ 看

translation.en: And they got into everything except for the pies.
translation.zh: 它们在所有食物中 除了派之外

translation.en: Okay, but don't panic. We'll just sell the people pies, that's all.
translation.zh: 好的 但别惊恐 我们将只卖那些派

translation.en: Wow. Goats really love pie.
translation.zh: 哦 山羊都喜欢派

translation.en: Leave them on for two hours.
translation.zh: 开两小时

translation.en: You got it.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: Everybody just take a deep breath and let's go back to having fun.
translation.zh: 大家都深呼吸一下 让我们尽情欢乐

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: -How'd we do? -We haven't even put a dent in it.
translation.zh: 怎么样？ 差得远呢

translation.en: -Hello? -Charlie, Jim Fields.
translation.zh: 喂？ 查理 吉姆费尔兹

translation.en: How's your vacation going? No, I'm just pulling your leg.
translation.zh: 你的假期怎么样？ 我只是开玩笑

translation.en: Listen, buddy, are you still looking for work?
translation.zh: 听着 伙计 你还在找工作？

translation.en: I've got a job for you, unless you've got other offers.
translation.zh: 除非你已经有了别的工作 我这有个工作想要让你做

translation.en: No, that's really interesting.
translation.zh: 不 我有兴趣 听起来不错

translation.en: But I've got something going on right now.
translation.zh: 但是我正在进行一些事情

translation.en: Before you say no, let me fax you over the proposal.
translation.zh: 在你说不之前 我用传真把工作意向书发给你

translation.en: You can take a look at the numbers, you think about it...
translation.zh: 你看一下薪水 考虑一下

translation.en: then you get back to me.
translation.zh: 然后联系我

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay. Great.
translation.zh: 好的 好极了

translation.en: You say hi to the wife and daughter.... Son.
translation.zh: 和你的妻子女儿…儿子打个招呼

translation.en: Let me guess. You couldn't get child services to come back...
translation.zh: 何瑞顿小姐 让我猜猜 我猜一下 你不能让儿童服务的人来

translation.en: so you're doing the inspection.
translation.zh: 所以你现在来审查

translation.en: I apologize. I don't like to be sneaky.
translation.zh: 我道歉 我并不想做坏人

translation.en: Still, rules are rules.
translation.zh: 规定还是规定

translation.en: -May I come in? I've a proposition for you. -Yeah, please do.
translation.zh: 我能进来吗？我有个建议给你 请进

translation.en: Can I get you some coffee or tea or water...
translation.zh: 你要咖啡还是茶还是水？

translation.en: -or eye of newt, maybe? -Water would be lovely.
translation.zh: 或者蝾螈眼？ 水就可以了 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -Water. That's an easy one.
translation.zh: 水就可以了 谢谢 水 很简单

translation.en: You don't mind tap water, do you? We're out of the bottled water.
translation.zh: 你不介意是自来水吧？ 瓶装的水喝光了

translation.en: So, Miss Harridan, why are you here?
translation.zh:
那么 何瑞顿太太
为什么你在这里？

translation.en: You seem smart, talented, highly ambitious.
translation.zh:
你看起来是聪明的 有才能的
非常雄心勃勃的

translation.en: What on earth are you doing running a day care center?
translation.zh: 你究竟在做什么？开一个托儿所？

translation.en: Maybe I enjoy running a day care center.
translation.zh: 或许我乐在其中

translation.en: Obviously. But is this really how you want to spend the rest of your life?
translation.zh: 很显然是的 但是这真的是你 过下半生的方式么？

translation.en: As a businessman, you'd have money, power, respect.
translation.zh: 作为一个生意人 你要有钱 有权力 受人尊敬

translation.en: You going to throw that all away to baby-sit a bunch of 3-year-olds?
translation.zh: 你要抛弃所有的那些而和这些 三岁孩子待在一起？

translation.en: I said I'd listen to your proposition. I'm all ears, and I got other things to do.
translation.zh: 我说过我会听你的建议 我还有别的事情要做

translation.en: -So if you'd be so kind-- -All right. Here it is:
translation.zh: 所以如果你能这么友好… 好的

translation.en: If Daddy Day Care should close, for whatever reason...
translation.zh: 如果奶爸托儿所 因为何种原因要关闭

translation.en: I'll take all your children for the price you charge.
translation.zh:
我会接受你所有的孩子
给你你所开的价格

translation.en: Topflight education at rock-bottom prices.
translation.zh: 最顶尖的教育 最低廉的价格

translation.en: Think about it.
translation.zh: 考虑一下吧

translation.en: Now wait a minute.
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: You're blowing us off for Cottony Cotton Balls?
translation.zh: 你要为了棉花豆要抛弃我们？

translation.en: No, Cotton Candy Puffs. Apparently the whole thing was my idea.
translation.zh: 是棉花糖豆 显然这都是我的主意

translation.en: They'll double my salary and let me run the division.
translation.zh: 他们会给我双倍的工资 并且让我管理一个部门

translation.en: So, yes, I am taking myself back.
translation.zh: 所以 是的 我要离开了

translation.en: Go ahead, if that's what's important to you. I mean....
translation.zh:
随你 如果这对你来说很重要
我的意思是…

translation.en: Phil and I can manage. We'll just find somebody else. Right?
translation.zh: 我和费尔能搞定 我们将会找另外的人 对吗？

translation.en: I'm going, too.
translation.zh: 我也要走了

translation.en: This is worse than when Spock betrayed Kirk...
translation.zh:
这比在《星际迷航5》里面的
史巴克背叛科克更糟

translation.en: -on Star Trek V. -It's not like that.
translation.zh:
这比在《星际迷航5》里面的
史巴克背叛科克更糟 马文 不是那样

translation.en: Come back with us. Not in the mailroom, but to be part of our team.
translation.zh:
回来跟我们一起吧 这次不是在邮件处
而是成为我们的一分子

translation.en: I don't want to be on that team. I want to be on this team.
translation.zh: 我不要跟你们一起 我选择我这边

translation.en: We thought a lot about this, man. It's a great opportunity.
translation.zh: 关于这个我们想过很多 这是个很好的机会

translation.en: No, this right here is a great opportunity.
translation.zh: 不 这里才是一个很好的机会

translation.en: This business is the one that has limits. And we've reached them, okay?
translation.zh: 马文 这个生意是有极限的 而我们已经达到极限了 好吗？

translation.en: Me and Phil, we got responsibilities to think about.
translation.zh: 我和费尔 我们有责任要承担

translation.en: -We got futures to take into consideration. -What about now? What about the kids?
translation.zh: 我们要考虑未来 那现在呢？那些孩子呢？

translation.en: These kids were fine before Daddy Day Care.
translation.zh: 在他们进来托儿所之前他们很好

translation.en: -They'll be fine when it's over. -You tell yourself that, Charlie.
translation.zh: 当这些都结束的时候 他们会很好 这只是你的想法 查理

translation.en: I finally found a place where I fit in...
translation.zh: 我最终找到了一个合适我的地方

translation.en: where I feel like I'm doing something good, and you guys just....
translation.zh:
在那里我觉得
我正在做一些不错的事情 而你们却……

translation.en: You just spoil it all.
translation.zh: 你们把所有都搞砸了

translation.en: That couldn't have gone worse.
translation.zh: 不能再糟了

translation.en: If you think that went bad, wait till we tell the kids.
translation.zh:
如果你觉得那很糟糕
看看我们告诉孩子是会怎么样吧

translation.en: Can I go to work with you?
translation.zh: 我能和你去工作吗？

translation.en: No, you can't go to work with me, but you can come visit me at work.
translation.zh: 不 你不能跟我去工作 但你能在工作时间去看我

translation.en: And Daddy will be home at night and on the weekends.
translation.zh: 爸爸晚上和周末都会在家

translation.en: -We'll still have lots of fun together. -Will Phil and Marvin still be here?
translation.zh: 我们还是能一起开心 费尔和马文还会待在这里？

translation.en: No, I'm sorry, little man. They won't be around anymore.
translation.zh: 不 对不起 他们将不会再待在这里

translation.en: It's just for a while, right?
translation.zh: 这种情况只是暂时的 对吗？

translation.en: Then you're going to come back and do Daddy Day Care again.
translation.zh: 然后你将会回来继续开奶爸安亲班

translation.en: No, this is from now on.
translation.zh: 不 再也不会了

translation.en: Daddy Day Care, we're not doing that anymore, Ben.
translation.zh: 我们再也不会继续运作托儿所了 本

translation.en: Let me explain it to you like this:
translation.zh: 让我解释给你听

translation.en: If Daddy does this, I can get money for us.
translation.zh: 如果爸爸做了这个 我能赚到足够多的钱

translation.en: And I can use that money to take care of the house and to buy food...
translation.zh: 我能用那些钱去还房贷 去买食物和衣服

translation.en: and clothes and toys for you to play with.
translation.zh: 去买食物和衣服 玩具给你玩

translation.en: I'll sell all my toys.
translation.zh: 我要卖掉我所有的玩具

translation.en: Why you want to sell all your toys?
translation.zh: 为什么？

translation.en: If I don't have toys, we don't need money, and you can stay with me.
translation.zh: 如果我不要玩具 我们就不需要钱 那么你就可以跟我在一起

translation.en: I wish it was that simple, Ben.
translation.zh: 我希望是那么简单 本

translation.en: The development department will have the first samples ready by next week.
translation.zh: 到下个星期 发展部将会有一个新的样本出来

translation.en: Okay, let's kick it around.
translation.zh: 好 让我们开始

translation.en: What do you think of when you think of cotton candy?
translation.zh: 当你想到棉花糖的时候 你还想到什么？

translation.en: -Clowns. -Chocolate.
translation.zh: 小丑 巧克力

translation.en: Cavities.
translation.zh: 蛀牙

translation.en: Hyperactivity, cavities, and dentist bills. That's what I....
translation.zh:
机能亢进 蛀牙
牙医费用 那是我…

translation.en: I've been to the other side and I've seen firsthand.
translation.zh: 我说到了另一面 我有第一手资料

translation.en: When kids eat this stuff, they crash down so hard they need an air bag.
translation.zh:
当孩子们吃这些东西的时候 他们将会需要一个空气袋
否则会窒息

translation.en: You know what the ingredients are to these balls?
translation.zh: 你知道这些球里面的成分吗？

translation.en: -Puffs. -They're "puffs." I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 酥 他们是“酥” 对不

translation.en: You know what's in here? Red dye number four and sugar.
translation.zh:
你知道里面有什么？
红染色值4号和糖

translation.en: You know what? Charlie is absolutely right. You can't ignore the reality.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 查理是正确的 你不能忽略现实

translation.en: Parents are not going to want to buy this product for their kids.
translation.zh: 父母们将不会 给他们的孩子们买这些产品

translation.en: Not unless those kids stomp and scream...
translation.zh: 除非孩子们又哭又闹

translation.en: and bang their little heads on the floor till blood comes out of their ears.
translation.zh: 高举着手在空中飞舞 直到血从他们的耳朵里出来

translation.en: Charlie, you got those figures that I gave you?
translation.zh: 查理 你拿到我给你的数字了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I got them right here. Just give me a second to....
translation.zh: 是的 在这里 再给我一分钟…

translation.en: We had an independent marketing firm do some preliminary research...
translation.zh: 我们有独立的稳固的市场调查公司 去做一些初步研究

translation.en: to sort out the core value of this product.
translation.zh: 找出这个产品的核心价值

translation.en: The subjects that were tested, aged two to six...
translation.zh: 我们测试的这些东西 针对二到六岁

translation.en: which are key branding years....
translation.zh: 这个年龄段的孩子…

translation.en: -Charlie, you want to join us? -I'm sorry about that, Jim. Yeah.
translation.zh: 查理 你要跟我们一起干吗？ 对不起 吉姆

translation.en: Why don't you tell everybody what the core value is?
translation.zh:
为什么你不告诉大家
核心价值是什么？

translation.en: What's the most important thing?
translation.zh: 什么是最重要的？

translation.en: My kid.
translation.zh: 我的孩子

translation.en: My kid, Jim, that's the most important thing.
translation.zh: 我的孩子 吉姆 那是最重要的东西 我的孩子

translation.en: And I think I've made a tremendous mistake.
translation.zh: 我想我过去犯了一个很大的错误

translation.en: And so, I quit.
translation.zh: 所以 我辞职

translation.en: What are you doing to me? You scared me.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-你想干什么？ 你吓到我了

translation.en: -How was the marketing meeting? -I quit.
translation.zh: 市场会议怎么样了？ 我辞职

translation.en: -What? -I quit.
translation.zh:
-什么？
-我辞职了

translation.en: -You quit? -I quit and I feel great.
translation.zh:
-你辞职了？
-我辞职了 我觉得那样很好

translation.en: -You should quit with me. -I should quit?
translation.zh:
-你应该和我一起辞职
-我应该辞职？

translation.en: -You should quit right now. -We just got here.
translation.zh:
-你应该现在就辞职
-我们才到这

translation.en: You want to feel how I'm feeling? Quit. Come on.
translation.zh:
你想要知道我现在的感觉吗？
辞职 快点

translation.en: -Quit! -Quit with me.
translation.zh:
-辞职吧！
-和我一起辞职

translation.en: You weren't going to sell the carrot suit, were you? The kids love that.
translation.zh:
马文
你不会是要卖那些胡萝卜衣服吧？ 孩子们爱死那个了

translation.en: This stuff...
translation.zh: 这些东西

translation.en: is not for sale!
translation.zh: 不卖！

translation.en: A literal reader of the text might say...
translation.zh: 这篇文章的读者会说

translation.en: that Goldilocks ate the "porridge"...
translation.zh: 白雪公主吃了毒苹果

translation.en: because she was "hungry."
translation.zh: 因为她很饿

translation.en: But what would Freud say?
translation.zh: 但是弗洛伊德会说什么？

translation.en: Language skills are a critical component of childhood development.
translation.zh: 语言能力是孩童 发育的重要部分

translation.en: They're part of the core curriculum here at Chapman.
translation.zh: 那是我们核心课程的一部分

translation.en: If you'll follow me this way.
translation.zh: 请跟我走

translation.en: On the path of life, the proper first steps are essential.
translation.zh: 在生命的旅途上 正确的起步是很重要的

translation.en: With our firm guidance, your children...
translation.zh: 通过我们严格的向导 你的孩子们

translation.en: will take those steps right here at Chapman.
translation.zh: 在这里将会有正确的起步

translation.en: Our philosophy is that a child is like a climbing vine.
translation.zh:
我们的哲学是 一个孩子就像
一株正在成长的攀缘植物

translation.en: With structure to cling to, and the right gardener to tend them...
translation.zh: 给他们支架 给他们最好的园丁

translation.en: -they'll grow to the sky. -That's the dumbest thing I ever heard.
translation.zh: 他们将直上蓝天 那是我听过最荒唐的事情

translation.en: We're not talking about plants, we're talking about kids.
translation.zh: 我们谈论的不是植物 而是孩子

translation.en: I know you don't want this woman pruning and cutting and weeding your 3-year-olds.
translation.zh: 我知道你不想让这个女人 修理你们心爱的孩子

translation.en: Some people are uncomfortable with achievement.
translation.zh: 一些人看别人成功就不舒服

translation.en: No, what I'm uncomfortable with is treating a little kid like it's an adult.
translation.zh: 不 我不舒服的是 把小孩子当作成人对待

translation.en: If your kids come here, they'll be miserable in four different languages.
translation.zh: 如果你们的孩子来这里 他们将会对四门语言课程感到痛苦

translation.en: Five. We start Portuguese in the fall.
translation.zh: 五门 我们这个秋天新开设了葡萄牙语

translation.en: How many languages do you listen to them in?
translation.zh: 你听过他们使用多少种语言？

translation.en: You ever stop trying to shove knowledge down their throat and just talk to them?
translation.zh: 请你别再把知识塞到他们的脑子里 和他们交流一下吧

translation.en: Listen to what they want.
translation.zh: 听听看他们想要什么

translation.en: They're children, they don't know what they want.
translation.zh: 他们还是孩子 他们不知道他们需要什么

translation.en: Yes, they do know what they want. All of them. And they're all different.
translation.zh: 不 他们知道他们要什么 所有的那些孩子 他们都是不同的

translation.en: We took some time, talked to the kids, got to know them a bit.
translation.zh: 我们花了一点时间和他们交流 多了解他们一些

translation.en: -It made a difference. It helped them. -Please. Share your success.
translation.zh:
那确实改变了很多东西
确实帮助了他们 说说你的成就吧

translation.en: Why don't you tell these people exactly how you help their children?
translation.zh: 你为什么不告诉这些人 你怎么帮助他们的孩子？

translation.en: Max over here is potty-trained now, okay?
translation.zh:
马克斯 那边的马克思
已经会自己上厕所了 是吗？

translation.en: -I don't miss. -That's right.
translation.zh: 我不会拉到外面了

translation.en: -And Becca learned how to read. -Yes, I did.
translation.zh: 嗯 贝可学会了识字 是的

translation.en: And Crispin is the most polite kid you'd ever want to meet.
translation.zh: 奎斯品是… 奎斯品是你遇到的最有礼貌的孩子

translation.en: -Thank you, Charlie. -You are most welcome, Crispin.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 查理 没什么 奎斯品

translation.en: And I made friends.
translation.zh: 我交了朋友

translation.en: That's right, little man, you made some friends.
translation.zh: 是的 小子 你交了些朋友

translation.en: As of this moment Daddy Day Care is back in business.
translation.zh: 现在 奶爸托儿所继续营业了

translation.en: -Don't be a fool. You won't make a nickel. -We might not get rich, but we'll manage.
translation.zh: 别傻了 你不可能凭空生钱 我们可能不会富有 但是我们能应付

translation.en: Excuse me. All right.
translation.zh: 对不起 那好吧 那个怎么样？

translation.en: How about that?
translation.zh: 那好吧 那个怎么样？

translation.en: Any boob can run a child-care center. It takes a family to raise some children.
translation.zh: 听着 任何一个笨蛋都可以开一座托儿所 家庭才能养育孩子

translation.en: -We're going to be a family from now on. -Family? What a laughable concept!
translation.zh: 从现在开始我们将组成一个家庭 家庭？多可笑的概念！

translation.en: We'll just laugh our way down the driveway.
translation.zh: 我们会一路说笑着去停车场

translation.en: -Have a pleasant day. -Bye, Miss Harridan.
translation.zh:
-祝你愉快 何瑞顿小姐
-再见 何瑞顿小姐

translation.en: Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: 来！走吧！

translation.en: Get in there! Come on! Let's go!
translation.zh: 进去 快点 我们走吧！

translation.en: Come on! Hold up!
translation.zh: 快点！等一下！

translation.en: -Everybody's holding hands, right? -Right.
translation.zh: 大家都手牵手 好吗？ 对

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走吧

translation.en: "Daddy Day Care."
translation.zh: “奶爸安亲班”

translation.en: Jennifer, how could you?
translation.zh: 詹妮弗 你怎么能这样？

translation.en: It's a really great place to work. You should apply there.
translation.zh: 这真的是一个很好的工作地方 你应该去申请来工作

translation.en: Or not.
translation.zh: 还是算了吧

translation.en: -Have a nice day, Miss Harridan. -That's nice.
translation.zh: 祝你愉快 何瑞顿小姐 好的

translation.en: Stop!
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: Help! Stuck!
translation.zh: 救命！我被卡住了！

translation.en: All right, here I come. What's going on here?
translation.zh: 好吧 我来了 这儿怎么了？

translation.en: Help!
translation.zh: 救命！

translation.en: I'm stuck!
translation.zh: 我被卡住了！

translation.en: Loser.
translation.zh: 失败者

translation.en: Loser.
translation.zh: 失败者

translation.en: Little man.
translation.zh: 嗨 小子

translation.en: I'd say this wasn't a bad tradeoff.
translation.zh: 我要说这是个不错的生意

translation.en: Yeah, Dad.
translation.zh: 是的 爸爸

translation.en: And, action.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: We can spend.... You know, we can't spend money without having it.
translation.zh:
我们能花… 你知道的 我们如果
没有钱我们就不能花钱

translation.en: Hold on one second.
translation.zh: 等一下

translation.en: What, are you being beamed up?
translation.zh: 什么 你被送上去了？

translation.en: -It's Captain Kirk. -It is!
translation.zh: 那是柯克船长 是的！

translation.en: Action.
translation.zh: 开始

translation.en: -What are you doing to me? -Pudding on my hand.
translation.zh:
-嗨
-你对我做了什么？ 布丁沾到我的手了

translation.en: Okay, wait a minute.
translation.zh: 好的 等一下

translation.en: -I would never push you in a sticker bush. -You couldn't push me.
translation.zh: 我用一个小毛刷就可以把你推动 你不可能推动我

translation.en: No, I'd use a shovel on you.
translation.zh: 不 我会使用铁锹把你撬起来

translation.en: Busy.
translation.zh: 忙碌

translation.en: Some other kids around here hanging out with you. How that sound?
translation.zh:
一些围绕在这里
和你跟进跟出的其它小孩 这听起来如何？

translation.en: -See, you going to have to work on it. -Mazel tov.
translation.zh: 看吧 你将必须要加把劲 恭喜

translation.en: Remember when you broke my yo-yo?
translation.zh: 记得你曾弄坏我的溜溜球吗？

translation.en: -I broke-- -And you never gave me a new one.
translation.zh: 我弄坏… 而你从未还我一个新的

translation.en: That's why you sent me to bed.
translation.zh: 这就是你为何送我上床

translation.en: You've been writing.
translation.zh: 你正在写字

translation.en: No, I can't even write my letters.
translation.zh: 不 我连我的信都没办法写

translation.en: What's going on here?
translation.zh: 这里发生什么事？

translation.en: You're killing me. You're really killing me.
translation.zh: 你让我受不了 真是受不了

translation.en: Joe Frazier's Smokin' Skillets!
translation.zh: 乔佛雷兹的烟熏小烧锅！

translation.en: These skillets were made in the City of Brotherly Love.
translation.zh:
这些小烧锅是在
充满友爱的城市中制造的

translation.en: -That's a good thing. -Okay, Eddie.
translation.zh: 那是好事 好的 艾迪

translation.en: They gave you a little too much direction, didn't they?
translation.zh: 他们给你过多的指示 不是吗？

translation.en: Okay, stop before you pee on yourself.
translation.zh: 好 停下来 免得你尿到你自己

translation.en: -What is my line? -"I'll sell all my toys."
translation.zh:
-什么是我的台词？
-“我会卖掉我所有的玩具”

translation.en: I'll sell all my toys.
translation.zh: 我会卖掉我所有的玩具

translation.en: I'll say my other line over again, because I messed it up. I say, "You--"
translation.zh:
我会反复说我的其它台词 因为我把它们搞混了
我说“你”

translation.en: -Action! -Okay, thank you.
translation.zh: 开始！ 好 谢谢你

translation.en: -Let it go for a second. There. -Thank you.
translation.zh: 暂时别管了 在那里 谢谢你

translation.en: That's why I know we haven't been to the moon.
translation.zh: 这就是为何我知道我们从未到过月球

translation.en: Miss Harridan says it's preparing me for my future.
translation.zh:
何瑞顿小姐说它可以让我
对我的未来预作准备

translation.en: -You hungry? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你饿了？

translation.en: -What do you feel like eating? -A peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
translation.zh: 是的 你想要吃什么？ 一个涂了花生酱和果酱的三明治

translation.en: Peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
translation.zh: 涂了花生酱和果酱的三明治

translation.en: -I don't know. -After this scene.
translation.zh:
-我不知道
-在下一个镜头

translation.en: If I give you--
translation.zh: 如果我给你…

translation.en: What's so funny?
translation.zh: 是什么这么好笑？
